416
417bool activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( player &p )
418{
419 if( !p.backlog.empty() ) {
420 player_activity &back_act = p.backlog.front();
421 if( back_act.is_multi_type() ) {
422 p.assign_activity( p.backlog.front().id() );
423 p.backlog.clear();
424 return true;
425 }
426 }
427 return false;
428}
429
430void activity_handlers::burrow_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
431{
432 sfx::play_activity_sound( "activity", "burrow", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
433 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
434 sounds::sound( act->placement, 10, sounds::sound_t::movement,
435 //~ Sound of a Rat mutant burrowing!
436 _( "ScratchCrunchScrabbleScurry." ) );
437 }
438}
439
440void activity_handlers::burrow_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
441{
442 tripoint pos = act->placement; // make a copy to avoid use-after-free
443 map &here = get_map();
444 act->set_to_null(); // kill activity before inflicting pain
445 if( here.is_bashable( pos ) && here.has_flag( flag_SUPPORTS_ROOF, pos ) &&
446 here.ter( pos ) != t_tree ) {
447 // Tunneling through solid rock is hungry, sweaty, tiring, backbreaking work
448 // Not quite as bad as the pickaxe, though
449 p->mod_stored_nutr( 10 );
450 p->mod_thirst( 10 );
451 p->mod_fatigue( 15 );
452 p->mod_pain( 3 * rng( 1, 3 ) );
453 } else if( here.move_cost( pos ) == 2 && g->get_levz() == 0 &&
454 here.ter( pos ) != t_dirt && here.ter( pos ) != t_grass ) {
455 //Breaking up concrete on the surface? not nearly as bad
456 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 );
457 p->mod_thirst( 5 );
458 p->mod_fatigue( 10 );
459 }
460 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish burrowing." ) );
461 here.destroy( pos, true );
462}
463
464static bool check_butcher_cbm( const int roll )
465{
466 // Failure rates for dissection rolls
467 // 90% at roll 0, 72% at roll 1, 60% at roll 2, 51% @ 3, 45% @ 4, 40% @ 5, ... , 25% @ 10
468 // Roll is roughly a rng(0, -3 + 1st_aid + fine_cut_quality + 1/2 electronics + small_dex_bonus)
469 // Roll is reduced by corpse damage level, but to no less than 0
470 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Roll = %i" ), roll );
471 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Failure chance = %f%%" ), ( 9.0f / ( 10.0f + roll * 2.5f ) ) * 100.0f );
472 const bool failed = x_in_y( 9, ( 10 + roll * 2.5 ) );
473 return !failed;
474}
475
476static void extract_or_wreck_cbms( const std::list<item> &cbms, int roll,
477 player &p )
478{
479 if( roll < 0 ) {
480 return;
481 }
482 for( item it : cbms ) {
483 // For some stupid reason, zombie pheromones are dropped using bionic type
484 // This complicates things
485 if( it.is_bionic() ) {
486 if( check_butcher_cbm( roll ) || it.typeId() == itype_burnt_out_bionic ) {
487 add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), it.tname() );
488 } else {
489 // We convert instead of recreating so that it keeps flags and faults
490 it.convert( itype_burnt_out_bionic );
491 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your imprecise surgery damaged a bionic, producing a %s." ), it.tname() );
492 }
493 } else {
494 if( !check_butcher_cbm( roll ) ) {
495 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your imprecise surgery destroyed some organs." ) );
496 continue;
497 } else {
498 add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), it.tname() );
499 }
500 }
501
502 if( it.type->phase == LIQUID ) {
503 // TODO: smarter NPC liquid handling
504 if( p.is_npc() ) {
505 drop_on_map( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { it }, p.pos() );
506 } else {
507 liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( it, 1 );
508 }
509 } else {
510 get_map().add_item( p.pos(), it );
511 }
512 }
513}
514
515// TODO: Implement
516enum class butcherable_rating : int {
517 butcherable = 0,
518 no_tool,
519 no_tree_rope_rack,
520 no_table,
521 no_saw,
522 too_damaged,
523 already_dressed,
524 already_skinned,
525 already_quartered,
526 too_small,
527 needs_dressing,
528 warn_cannibalism,
529 info_tools
530};
531
532butchery_setup consider_butchery( const item &corpse_item, player &u, butcher_type action )
533{
534 map &here = get_map();
535 butchery_setup setup;
536 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::yes;
537 setup.type = action;
538 const auto wont_do = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
539 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
540 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::never;
541 };
542 const auto not_this_one = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
543 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
544 if( setup.can_do != butchery_possibility::never ) {
545 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::not_this;
546 }
547 };
548 const auto info = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
549 setup.info.emplace_back( msg );
550 };
551 const auto need_confirm = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
552 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
553 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::yes ) {
554 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::need_confirmation;
555 }
556 };
557
558 const inventory &inv = u.crafting_inventory();
559 const int factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER );
560
561 const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
562
563 if( action != DISSECT && factor == INT_MIN ) {
564 wont_do( _( "None of your cutting tools are suitable for butchering." ),
565 butcherable_rating::no_tool );
566 }
567
568 if( action == DISSECT ) {
569 switch( factor ) {
570 case INT_MIN:
571 wont_do( _( "None of your tools are sharp and precise enough to do that." ),
572 butcherable_rating::no_tool );
573 break;
574 case 1:
575 info( _( "You could use a better tool, but this will do." ), butcherable_rating::info_tools );
576 break;
577 case 2:
578 info( _( "This tool is great, but you still would like a scalpel." ),
579 butcherable_rating::info_tools );
580 break;
581 case 3:
582 info( _( "You dissect the corpse with a trusty scalpel." ), butcherable_rating::info_tools );
583 break;
584 case 5:
585 info( _( "You dissect the corpse with a sophisticated system of surgical grade scalpels." ),
586 butcherable_rating::info_tools );
587 break;
588 }
589 }
590
591 bool has_tree_nearby = false;
592 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
593 if( here.has_flag( flag_TREE, pt ) ) {
594 has_tree_nearby = true;
595 break;
596 }
597 }
598 bool b_rack_present = false;
599 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
600 if( here.has_flag_furn( flag_BUTCHER_EQ, pt ) ) {
601 b_rack_present = true;
602 break;
603 }
604 }
605 if( !b_rack_present ) {
606 b_rack_present = inv.has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
607 return it.has_flag( "BUTCHER_RACK" );
608 } );
609 }
610 // workshop butchery (full) prequisites
611 if( action == BUTCHER_FULL ) {
612 const bool has_rope = inv.has_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 ) ||
613 inv.has_amount( itype_rope_makeshift_30, 1 ) ||
614 inv.has_amount( itype_hd_tow_cable, 1 ) ||
615 inv.has_amount( itype_vine_30, 1 ) ||
616 inv.has_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 );
617 const bool big_corpse = corpse.size >= MS_MEDIUM;
618
619 if( big_corpse ) {
620 if( has_rope && !has_tree_nearby && !b_rack_present ) {
621 not_this_one(
622 _( "You need to suspend this corpse to butcher it. While you have a rope to lift the corpse, there is no tree nearby to hang it from." ),
623 butcherable_rating::no_tree_rope_rack );
624 }
625 if( !has_rope && !b_rack_present ) {
626 not_this_one(
627 _( "To perform a full butchery on a corpse this big, you need either a butchering rack, a nearby hanging meathook, or both a long rope in your inventory and a nearby tree to hang the corpse from." ),
628 butcherable_rating::no_tree_rope_rack );
629 }
630 if( !( here.has_nearby_table( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) || inv.has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
631 return it.has_flag( "FLAT_SURFACE" );
632 } ) ) ) {
633 not_this_one(
634 _( "To perform a full butchery on a corpse this big, you need a table nearby or something else with a flat surface. A leather tarp spread out on the ground could suffice." ),
635 butcherable_rating::no_table );
636 }
637 }
638 }
639
640 if( action == DISSECT && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ||
641 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
642 not_this_one( _( "It would be futile to search for implants inside this badly damaged corpse." ),
643 butcherable_rating::too_damaged );
644 }
645
646 if( action == F_DRESS && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
647 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
648 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is already field dressed." ),
649 butcherable_rating::already_dressed );
650 }
651
652 if( action == SKIN && corpse_item.has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
653 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is already skinned." ), butcherable_rating::already_skinned );
654 }
655
656 if( action == QUARTER ) {
657 if( corpse.size == MS_TINY ) {
658 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is too small to quarter without damaging." ),
659 butcherable_rating::too_small );
660 }
661 if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
662 not_this_one( _( "This is already quartered." ), butcherable_rating::already_quartered );
663 }
664 if( !( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
665 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) &&
666 corpse_item.get_mtype()->harvest->has_entry_type( "offal" ) ) {
667 not_this_one( _( "You need to perform field dressing before quartering." ),
668 butcherable_rating::needs_dressing );
669 }
670 }
671
672 // applies to all butchery actions
673 const bool is_human = corpse.id == mtype_id::NULL_ID() || ( corpse.in_species( HUMAN ) &&
674 !corpse.in_species( ZOMBIE ) );
675 if( is_human && !( u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_CANNIBAL ) ||
676 u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) ||
677 u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) ) {
678 need_confirm( _( "Would you dare desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being?" ),
679 butcherable_rating::warn_cannibalism );
680 }
681
682 setup.move_cost = butcher_time_to_cut( inv, corpse_item, action );
683
684 return setup;
685}
686
687static void set_up_butchery_activity( player_activity &act, player &u, const butchery_setup &setup )
688{
689 const auto print_reasons = [&u, &setup]() {
690 for( const std::string &prob : setup.problems ) {
691 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, prob );
692 }
693 if( setup.problems.empty() ) {
694 for( const std::string &info : setup.info ) {
695 u.add_msg_if_player( m_info, info );
696 }
697 }
698 };
699
700 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::never ) {
701 act.set_to_null();
702 print_reasons();
703 return;
704 }
705 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::not_this ) {
706 act.targets.pop_back();
707 print_reasons();
708 return;
709 }
710 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::need_confirmation ) {
711 if( u.is_player() ) {
712 if( query_yn( _( "Would you dare desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being?" ) ) ) {
713 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
714 case 1:
715 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You clench your teeth at the prospect of this gruesome job." ) );
716 break;
717 case 2:
718 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This will haunt you in your dreams." ) );
719 break;
720 case 3:
721 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
722 _( "You try to look away, but this gruesome image will stay on your mind for some time." ) );
723 break;
724 }
725 g->u.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
726 } else {
727 u.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "It needs a coffin, not a knife." ) );
728 act.targets.pop_back();
729 return;
730 }
731 } else {
732 u.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
733 }
734 }
735
736 print_reasons();
737 act.moves_left = setup.move_cost;
738 // We have a valid target, so preform the full finish function
739 // instead of just selecting the next valid target
740 act.index = false;
741}
742
743static int size_factor_in_time_to_cut( m_size size )
744{
745 switch( size ) {
746 // Time (roughly) in turns to cut up the corpse
747 case MS_TINY:
748 return 150;
749 case MS_SMALL:
750 return 300;
751 case MS_MEDIUM:
752 return 450;
753 case MS_LARGE:
754 return 600;
755 case MS_HUGE:
756 return 1800;
757 default:
758 debugmsg( "Invalid m_size value for butchering corpse: %d", static_cast<int>( size ) );
759 break;
760 }
761 return 0;
762}
763
764int butcher_time_to_cut( const inventory &inv, const item &corpse_item, const butcher_type action )
765{
766 const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
767 const int initial_factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER );
768 // Multiplier for dissection, since it uses different "quality units"
769 const int factor = action == DISSECT ? ( initial_factor * 15 ) : initial_factor;
770
771 int time_to_cut = size_factor_in_time_to_cut( corpse.size );
772 // At factor 0, base 100 time_to_cut remains 100. At factor 50, it's 50 , at factor 75 it's 25
773 time_to_cut *= std::max( 25, 100 - factor );
774 if( time_to_cut < 3000 ) {
775 time_to_cut = 3000;
776 }
777
778 switch( action ) {
779 case BUTCHER:
780 break;
781 case BUTCHER_FULL:
782 if( !corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
783 time_to_cut *= 6;
784 } else {
785 time_to_cut *= 4;
786 }
787 break;
788 case F_DRESS:
789 case SKIN:
790 time_to_cut *= 2;
791 break;
792 case QUARTER:
793 time_to_cut = std::max( 1000, time_to_cut / 4 );
794 break;
795 case DISMEMBER:
796 time_to_cut = std::max( 400, time_to_cut / 10 );
797 break;
798 case DISSECT:
799 time_to_cut *= 7;
800 break;
801 }
802
803 if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
804 time_to_cut /= 4;
805 }
806 time_to_cut = time_to_cut * ( 10 - g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size() ) / 10;
807 return time_to_cut;
808}
809
810// this function modifies the input weight by its damage level, depending on the bodypart
811static int corpse_damage_effect( int weight, const std::string &entry_type, int damage_level )
812{
813 const float slight_damage = 0.9;
814 const float damage = 0.75;
815 const float high_damage = 0.5;
816 const int destroyed = 0;
817
818 switch( damage_level ) {
819 case 2:
820 // "damaged"
821 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
822 return std::round( weight * damage );
823 }
824 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
825 return std::round( weight * damage );
826 }
827 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
828 return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
829 }
830 break;
831 case 3:
832 // "mangled"
833 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
834 return destroyed;
835 }
836 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
837 return std::round( weight * high_damage );
838 }
839 if( entry_type == "bone" ) {
840 return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
841 }
842 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
843 return std::round( weight * damage );
844 }
845 break;
846 case 4:
847 // "pulped"
848 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
849 return destroyed;
850 }
851 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
852 return destroyed;
853 }
854 if( entry_type == "bone" ) {
855 return std::round( weight * damage );
856 }
857 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
858 return std::round( weight * high_damage );
859 }
860 break;
861 default:
862 // "bruised" modifier is almost impossible to avoid; also includes no modifier (zero damage)
863 break;
864 }
865 return weight;
866}
867
868static void butchery_drops_harvest( item *corpse_item, const mtype &mt, player &p,
869 const std::function<int()> &roll_butchery, butcher_type action,
870 const std::function<double()> &roll_drops )
871{
872 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, mt.harvest->message() );
873 int monster_weight = to_gram( mt.weight );
874 monster_weight += std::round( monster_weight * rng_float( -0.1, 0.1 ) );
875 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
876 monster_weight *= 0.95;
877 }
878 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) ) {
879 monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
880 if( action != F_DRESS ) {
881 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
882 _( "You salvage what you can from the corpse, but it is badly damaged." ) );
883 }
884 }
885 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
886 monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
887 }
888 int practice = 4 + roll_butchery();
889
890 if( mt.harvest.is_null() ) {
891 debugmsg( "ERROR: %s has no harvest entry.", mt.id.c_str() );
892 return;
893 }
894
895 map &here = get_map();
896 for( const harvest_entry &entry : *mt.harvest ) {
897 const int butchery = roll_butchery();
898 const float min_num = entry.base_num.first + butchery * entry.scale_num.first;
899 const float max_num = entry.base_num.second + butchery * entry.scale_num.second;
900 int roll = 0;
901 // mass_ratio will override the use of base_num, scale_num, and max
902 if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
903 roll = static_cast<int>( std::round( entry.mass_ratio * monster_weight ) );
904 roll = corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level( 4 ) );
905 } else if( entry.type != "bionic" && entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
906 roll = std::min<int>( entry.max, std::round( rng_float( min_num, max_num ) ) );
907 // will not give less than min_num defined in the JSON
908 roll = std::max<int>( corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level( 4 ) ),
909 entry.base_num.first );
910 }
911 const itype *drop = nullptr;
912 if( entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
913 drop = &*itype_id( entry.drop );
914 }
915
916 // BIONIC handling - no code for DISSECT to let the bionic drop fall through
917 if( entry.type == "bionic" || entry.type == "bionic_group" ) {
918 if( action == F_DRESS ) {
919 if( drop != nullptr && !drop->bionic ) {
920 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
921 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
922 _( "You notice some strange organs, perhaps harvestable via careful dissection." ) );
923 }
924 continue;
925 }
926 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
927 _( "You notice there are bionics implanted in this corpse, that careful dissection might preserve." ) );
928 continue;
929 }
930 if( action == BUTCHER || action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == DISMEMBER ) {
931 if( drop != nullptr && !drop->bionic ) {
932 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
933 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
934 _( "Your butchering tool destroys a strange organ. Perhaps a more surgical approach would allow harvesting it." ) );
935 }
936 continue;
937 }
938 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
939 case 1:
940 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
941 _( "Your butchering tool encounters something implanted in this corpse, but your rough cuts destroy it." ) );
942 break;
943 case 2:
944 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
945 _( "You find traces of implants in the body, but you care only for the flesh." ) );
946 break;
947 case 3:
948 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
949 _( "You found some bionics in the body, but harvesting them would require more surgical approach." ) );
950 break;
951 }
952 continue;
953 }
954 }
955
956 // Check if monster was gibbed, and handle accordingly
957 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) && ( entry.type == "flesh" || entry.type == "bone" ) ) {
958 roll /= 2;
959 }
960
961 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) && entry.type == "skin" ) {
962 roll = 0;
963 }
964
965 // QUICK BUTCHERY
966 if( action == BUTCHER ) {
967 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
968 roll = roll / 4;
969 } else if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
970 roll /= 2;
971 } else if( corpse_item->get_mtype()->size >= MS_MEDIUM && ( entry.type == "skin" ) ) {
972 roll /= 2;
973 } else if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
974 roll /= 5;
975 } else {
976 continue;
977 }
978 }
979 // RIP AND TEAR
980 if( action == DISMEMBER ) {
981 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
982 roll /= 6;
983 } else {
984 continue;
985 }
986 }
987 // field dressing ignores everything outside below list
988 if( action == F_DRESS ) {
989 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
990 roll = rng( 0, roll / 2 );
991 }
992 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
993 continue;
994 }
995 if( entry.type == "skin" ) {
996 continue;
997 }
998 }
999
1000 // you only get the skin from skinning
1001 if( action == SKIN ) {
1002 if( entry.type != "skin" ) {
1003 continue;
1004 }
1005 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1006 roll = rng( 0, roll );
1007 }
1008 }
1009
1010 // field dressing removed innards and bones from meatless limbs
1011 if( ( action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == BUTCHER ) && corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ) {
1012 if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
1013 continue;
1014 }
1015 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
1016 roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1017 }
1018 }
1019 // unskillfull field dressing may damage the skin, meat, and other parts
1020 if( ( action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == BUTCHER ) &&
1021 corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1022 if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
1023 continue;
1024 }
1025 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
1026 roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1027 }
1028 if( entry.type == "flesh" || entry.type == "skin" ) {
1029 roll = rng( 0, roll );
1030 }
1031 }
1032 // quartering ruins skin
1033 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
1034 if( entry.type == "skin" ) {
1035 //not continue to show fail effect
1036 roll = 0;
1037 } else {
1038 roll /= 4;
1039 }
1040 }
1041
1042 if( entry.type != "bionic" && entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
1043 // divide total dropped weight by drop's weight to get amount
1044 if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
1045 // apply skill before converting to items, but only if mass_ratio is defined
1046 roll *= roll_drops();
1047 roll = std::ceil( static_cast<double>( roll ) /
1048 to_gram( drop->weight ) );
1049 }
1050
1051 if( roll <= 0 ) {
1052 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You fail to harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( 1 ) );
1053 continue;
1054 }
1055 if( drop->phase == LIQUID ) {
1056 item obj( drop, calendar::turn, roll );
1057 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1058 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1059 }
1060 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1061 obj.set_flag( flg );
1062 }
1063 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1064 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1065 }
1066 // TODO: smarter NPC liquid handling
1067 if( p.is_npc() ) {
1068 drop_on_map( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { obj }, p.pos() );
1069 } else {
1070 liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( obj, 1 );
1071 }
1072 } else if( drop->count_by_charges() ) {
1073 item obj( drop, calendar::turn, roll );
1074 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1075 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1076 }
1077 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1078 obj.set_flag( flg );
1079 }
1080 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1081 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1082 }
1083 if( !p.backlog.empty() && p.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1084 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
1085 }
1086 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), obj );
1087 } else {
1088 item obj( drop, calendar::turn );
1089 obj.set_mtype( &mt );
1090 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1091 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1092 }
1093 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1094 obj.set_flag( flg );
1095 }
1096 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1097 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1098 }
1099 if( !p.backlog.empty() && p.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1100 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
1101 }
1102 for( int i = 0; i != roll; ++i ) {
1103 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), obj );
1104 }
1105 }
1106 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( roll ) );
1107 }
1108 practice++;
1109 }
1110 // 20% of the original corpse weight is not an item, but liquid gore
1111
1112 if( action != DISSECT ) {
1113 p.practice( skill_survival, std::max( 0, practice ), std::max( mt.size - MS_MEDIUM, 0 ) + 4 );
1114 }
1115}
1116
1117static void butchery_quarter( item *corpse_item, const player &p )
1118{
1119 corpse_item->set_flag( flag_QUARTERED );
1120 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1121 _( "You roughly slice the corpse of %s into four parts and set them aside." ),
1122 corpse_item->get_mtype()->nname() );
1123 map &here = get_map();
1124 // 4 quarters (one exists, add 3, flag does the rest)
1125 for( int i = 1; i <= 3; i++ ) {
1126 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *corpse_item, true );
1127 }
1128}
1129
1130void activity_handlers::butcher_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1131{
1132 // No targets means we are done
1133 if( act->targets.empty() ) {
1134 act->set_to_null();
1135 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
1136 return;
1137 }
1138
1139 map &here = get_map();
1140 item_location target = act->targets.back();
1141 const inventory &inv = p->crafting_inventory();
1142
1143 // Corpses can disappear (rezzing!), so check for that
1144 if( !target || !target->is_corpse() ) {
1145 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no corpse to butcher!" ) );
1146 act->set_to_null();
1147 return;
1148 }
1149
1150 butcher_type action = BUTCHER;
1151 if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER ) {
1152 action = BUTCHER;
1153 } else if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER_FULL ) {
1154 action = BUTCHER_FULL;
1155 } else if( act->id() == ACT_FIELD_DRESS ) {
1156 action = F_DRESS;
1157 } else if( act->id() == ACT_QUARTER ) {
1158 action = QUARTER;
1159 } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISSECT ) {
1160 action = DISSECT;
1161 } else if( act->id() == ACT_SKIN ) {
1162 action = SKIN;
1163 } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISMEMBER ) {
1164 action = DISMEMBER;
1165 }
1166
1167 // index is a bool that determines if we are ready to start the next target
1168 if( act->index ) {
1169 const butchery_setup setup = consider_butchery( *target, *p, action );
1170 set_up_butchery_activity( *act, *p, setup );
1171 return;
1172 }
1173
1174 item &corpse_item = *target;
1175 const mtype *corpse = corpse_item.get_mtype();
1176 const field_type_id type_blood = corpse->bloodType();
1177 const field_type_id type_gib = corpse->gibType();
1178
1179 if( action == QUARTER ) {
1180 butchery_quarter( &corpse_item, *p );
1181 act->index = true;
1182 return;
1183 }
1184
1185 int skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1186 int factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE :
1187 qual_BUTCHER );
1188
1189 // DISSECT has special case factor calculation and results.
1190 if( action == DISSECT ) {
1191 skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
1192 skill_level += inv.max_quality( qual_CUT_FINE );
1193 skill_level += p->get_skill_level( skill_electronics ) / 2;
1194 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Skill: %s" ), skill_level );
1195 }
1196
1197 const auto roll_butchery = [&]() {
1198 double skill_shift = 0.0;
1199 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases butcher rolls
1200 skill_shift += rng_float( 0, skill_level - 3 );
1201 ///\EFFECT_DEX >8 randomly increases butcher rolls, slightly, <8 decreases
1202 skill_shift += rng_float( 0, p->get_dex() - 8 ) / 4.0;
1203
1204 if( factor < 0 ) {
1205 skill_shift -= rng_float( 0, -factor / 5.0 );
1206 }
1207
1208 return static_cast<int>( std::round( skill_shift ) );
1209 };
1210
1211 if( action == DISMEMBER ) {
1212 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1213 }
1214
1215 //all BUTCHERY types - FATAL FAILURE
1216 if( action != DISSECT && roll_butchery() <= ( -15 ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
1217 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1218 case 1:
1219 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1220 _( "You hack up the corpse so unskillfully, that there is nothing left to salvage from this bloody mess." ) );
1221 break;
1222 case 2:
1223 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1224 _( "You wanted to cut the corpse, but instead you hacked the meat, spilled the guts all over it, and made a bloody mess." ) );
1225 break;
1226 case 3:
1227 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1228 _( "You made so many mistakes during the process that you doubt even vultures will be interested in what's left of it." ) );
1229 break;
1230 }
1231
1232 // Remove the target from the map
1233 target.remove_item();
1234 act->targets.pop_back();
1235
1236 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1237 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1238 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1239 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1240 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1241 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1242 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1243 }
1244
1245 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one
1246 act->index = true;
1247 return;
1248 }
1249 // function just for drop yields
1250 const auto roll_drops = [&]() {
1251 factor = std::max( factor, -50 );
1252 return 0.5 * skill_level / 10 + 0.3 * ( factor + 50 ) / 100 + 0.2 * p->dex_cur / 20;
1253 };
1254 // all action types - yields
1255 butchery_drops_harvest( &corpse_item, *corpse, *p, roll_butchery, action, roll_drops );
1256 // after this point, if there was a liquid handling from the harvest,
1257 // and the liquid handling was interrupted, then the activity was canceled,
1258 // therefore operations on this activities targets and values may be invalidated.
1259 // reveal hidden items / hidden content
1260 if( action == DISSECT ) {
1261 int roll = roll_butchery() - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 );
1262 roll = roll < 0 ? 0 : roll;
1263 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Roll penalty for corpse damage = %s" ), 0 - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 ) );
1264 std::list<item> cbms = corpse_item.components;
1265 for( const item *it : corpse_item.contents.all_items_top() ) {
1266 cbms.push_back( *it );
1267 }
1268 extract_or_wreck_cbms( cbms, roll, *p );
1269 // those lines are for XP gain with dissecting. It depends on the size of the corpse, time to dissect the corpse and the amount of bionics you would gather.
1270 int time_to_cut = size_factor_in_time_to_cut( corpse->size );
1271 int level_cap = std::min<int>( MAX_SKILL, ( corpse->size + ( cbms.size() * 2 + 1 ) ) );
1272 int size_mult = corpse->size > MS_MEDIUM ? ( corpse->size * corpse->size ) : 8;
1273 int practice_amt = ( size_mult + 1 ) * ( ( time_to_cut / 150 ) + 1 ) *
1274 ( cbms.size() * cbms.size() / 2 + 1 );
1275 p->practice( skill_firstaid, practice_amt, level_cap );
1276 add_msg( m_debug, "Experience: %d, Level cap: %d, Time to cut: %d", practice_amt, level_cap,
1277 time_to_cut );
1278 }
1279
1280 //end messages and effects
1281 switch( action ) {
1282 case QUARTER:
1283 break;
1284 case BUTCHER:
1285 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1286 _( "You apply few quick cuts to the %s and leave what's left of it for scavengers." ),
1287 corpse_item.tname() );
1288
1289 // Remove the target from the map
1290 target.remove_item();
1291 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1292 act->targets.pop_back();
1293 }
1294 break;
1295 case BUTCHER_FULL:
1296 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish butchering the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1297
1298 // Remove the target from the map
1299 target.remove_item();
1300 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1301 act->targets.pop_back();
1302 }
1303 break;
1304 case F_DRESS:
1305 // partial failure
1306 if( roll_butchery() < 0 ) {
1307 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1308 case 1:
1309 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1310 _( "You unskillfully hack up the corpse and chop off some excess body parts. You're left wondering how you did so poorly." ) );
1311 break;
1312 case 2:
1313 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1314 _( "Your unskilled hands slip and damage the corpse. You still hope it's not a total waste though." ) );
1315 break;
1316 case 3:
1317 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1318 _( "You did something wrong and hacked the corpse badly. Maybe it's still recoverable." ) );
1319 break;
1320 }
1321 corpse_item.set_flag( "FIELD_DRESS_FAILED" );
1322
1323 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1324 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1325 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1326 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1327 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1328 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1329 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1330 }
1331
1332 } else {
1333 // success
1334 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1335 case 1:
1336 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You field dress the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1337 break;
1338 case 2:
1339 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1340 _( "You slice the corpse's belly and remove intestines and organs, until you're confident that it will not rot from inside." ) );
1341 break;
1342 case 3:
1343 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1344 _( "You remove guts and excess parts, preparing the corpse for later use." ) );
1345 break;
1346 }
1347 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS );
1348
1349 here.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1350 here.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1351 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1352 here.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1353 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1354 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( here.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1355 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1356 }
1357
1358 }
1359 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1360 act->targets.pop_back();
1361 }
1362 break;
1363 case SKIN:
1364 switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
1365 case 1:
1366 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You skin the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1367 break;
1368 case 2:
1369 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You carefully remove the hide from the %s" ),
1370 corpse->nname() );
1371 break;
1372 case 3:
1373 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1374 _( "The %s is challenging to skin, but you get a good hide from it." ),
1375 corpse->nname() );
1376 break;
1377 case 4:
1378 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a few deft slices you take the skin from the %s" ),
1379 corpse->nname() );
1380 break;
1381 }
1382 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_SKINNED );
1383 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1384 act->targets.pop_back();
1385 }
1386 break;
1387 case DISMEMBER:
1388 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1389 case 1:
1390 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You hack the %s apart." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1391 break;
1392 case 2:
1393 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You lop the limbs off the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1394 break;
1395 case 3:
1396 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You cleave the %s into pieces." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1397 }
1398
1399 // Remove the target from the map
1400 target.remove_item();
1401 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1402 act->targets.pop_back();
1403 }
1404 break;
1405 case DISSECT:
1406 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish dissecting the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1407
1408 // Remove the target from the map
1409 target.remove_item();
1410 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1411 act->targets.pop_back();
1412 }
1413 break;
1414 }
1415
1416 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one (for example if multibutchering)
1417 act->index = true;
1418 // if its mutli-tile butchering,then restart the backlog.
1419 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
1420}
1421
1422void activity_handlers::shear_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1423{
1424 if( act->coords.empty() ) {
1425 debugmsg( "shearing activity with no position of monster stored" );
1426 return;
1427 }
1428 item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
1429 item *shears = loc.get_item();
1430 if( shears == nullptr ) {
1431 debugmsg( "shearing item location lost" );
1432 return;
1433 }
1434 map &here = get_map();
1435 const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( act->coords.at( 0 ) );
1436 monster *source_mon = g->critter_at<monster>( source_pos );
1437 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1438 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for shearing" );
1439 return;
1440 }
1441 // 22 wool staples corresponds to an average wool-producing sheep yield of 10 lbs or so
1442 for( int i = 0; i != 22; ++i ) {
1443 item wool_staple( itype_wool_staple, calendar::turn );
1444 here.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), wool_staple );
1445 }
1446 source_mon->add_effect( effect_sheared, calendar::season_length() );
1447 if( !act->str_values.empty() && act->str_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
1448 source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
1449 }
1450 act->set_to_null();
1451 if( shears->type->can_have_charges() ) {
1452 p->consume_charges( *shears, shears->type->charges_to_use() );
1453 }
1454}
1455
1456void activity_handlers::milk_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1457{
1458 if( act->coords.empty() ) {
1459 debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" );
1460 return;
1461 }
1462 map &here = get_map();
1463 const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( act->coords.at( 0 ) );
1464 monster *source_mon = g->critter_at<monster>( source_pos );
1465 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1466 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
1467 return;
1468 }
1469 auto milked_item = source_mon->ammo.find( source_mon->type->starting_ammo.begin()->first );
1470 if( milked_item == source_mon->ammo.end() ) {
1471 debugmsg( "animal has no milkable ammo type" );
1472 return;
1473 }
1474 if( milked_item->second <= 0 ) {
1475 debugmsg( "started milking but udders are now empty before milking finishes" );
1476 return;
1477 }
1478 item milk( milked_item->first, calendar::turn, milked_item->second );
1479 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( milk, nullptr, 1, nullptr, nullptr, -1, source_mon ) ) {
1480 milked_item->second = 0;
1481 if( milk.charges > 0 ) {
1482 milked_item->second = milk.charges;
1483 } else {
1484 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s's udders run dry." ), source_mon->get_name() );
1485 }
1486 }
1487 // if the monster was not manually tied up, but needed to be fixed in place temporarily then
1488 // remove that now.
1489 if( !act->str_values.empty() && act->str_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
1490 source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
1491 }
1492 act->set_to_null();
1493}
1494
1495void activity_handlers::fill_liquid_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1496{
1497 player_activity &act_ref = *act;
1498 try {
1499 // 1. Gather the source item.
1500 vehicle *source_veh = nullptr;
1501 const tripoint source_pos = act_ref.coords.at( 0 );
1502 map &here = get_map();
1503 map_stack source_stack = here.i_at( source_pos );
1504 map_stack::iterator on_ground;
1505 monster *source_mon = nullptr;
1506 item liquid;
1507 const liquid_source_type source_type = static_cast<liquid_source_type>( act_ref.values.at( 0 ) );
1508 int part_num = -1;
1509 int veh_charges = 0;
1510 switch( source_type ) {
1511 case LST_VEHICLE:
1512 source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( source_pos ) );
1513 if( source_veh == nullptr ) {
1514 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1515 }
1516 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1517 part_num = static_cast<int>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1518 veh_charges = liquid.charges;
1519 break;
1520 case LST_INFINITE_MAP:
1521 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1522 liquid.charges = item::INFINITE_CHARGES;
1523 break;
1524 case LST_MAP_ITEM:
1525 if( static_cast<size_t>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) ) >= source_stack.size() ) {
1526 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source item on ground for liquid transfer" );
1527 }
1528 on_ground = source_stack.begin();
1529 std::advance( on_ground, act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1530 liquid = *on_ground;
1531 break;
1532 case LST_MONSTER:
1533 Creature *c = g->critter_at( source_pos );
1534 source_mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( c );
1535 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1536 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
1537 act_ref.set_to_null();
1538 }
1539 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1540 liquid.charges = 1;
1541 break;
1542 }
1543
1544 static const units::volume volume_per_second = units::from_liter( 4.0F / 6.0F );
1545 const int charges_per_second = std::max( 1, liquid.charges_per_volume( volume_per_second ) );
1546 liquid.charges = std::min( charges_per_second, liquid.charges );
1547 const int original_charges = liquid.charges;
1548
1549 // 2. Transfer charges.
1550 switch( static_cast<liquid_target_type>( act_ref.values.at( 2 ) ) ) {
1551 case LTT_VEHICLE:
1552 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) ) ) {
1553 p->pour_into( vp->vehicle(), liquid );
1554 } else {
1555 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find target vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1556 }
1557 break;
1558 case LTT_CONTAINER:
1559 p->pour_into( p->i_at( act_ref.values.at( 3 ) ), liquid );
1560 break;
1561 case LTT_MAP:
1562 if( iexamine::has_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) ) ) {
1563 iexamine::pour_into_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1564 } else {
1565 here.add_item_or_charges( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1566 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pour %1$s onto the ground." ), liquid.tname() );
1567 liquid.charges = 0;
1568 }
1569 break;
1570 case LTT_MONSTER:
1571 liquid.charges = 0;
1572 break;
1573 }
1574
1575 const int removed_charges = original_charges - liquid.charges;
1576 if( removed_charges == 0 ) {
1577 // Nothing has been transferred, target must be full.
1578 act_ref.set_to_null();
1579 return;
1580 }
1581
1582 // 3. Remove charges from source.
1583 switch( source_type ) {
1584 case LST_VEHICLE:
1585 if( part_num != -1 ) {
1586 source_veh->drain( part_num, removed_charges );
1587 liquid.charges = veh_charges - removed_charges;
1588 // If there's no liquid left in this tank we're done, otherwise
1589 // we need to update our liquid serialization to reflect how
1590 // many charges are actually left for the next time we come
1591 // around this loop.
1592 if( !liquid.charges ) {
1593 act_ref.set_to_null();
1594 } else {
1595 if( act_ref.str_values.empty() ) {
1596 act_ref.str_values.push_back( std::string() );
1597 }
1598 act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) = serialize( liquid );
1599 }
1600 } else {
1601 source_veh->drain( liquid.typeId(), removed_charges );
1602 }
1603 if( source_veh->fuel_left( liquid.typeId() ) <= 0 ) {
1604 act_ref.set_to_null();
1605 }
1606 break;
1607 case LST_MAP_ITEM:
1608 on_ground->charges -= removed_charges;
1609 if( on_ground->charges <= 0 ) {
1610 source_stack.erase( on_ground );
1611 if( here.ter( source_pos ).obj().examine == &iexamine::gaspump ) {
1612 add_msg( _( "With a clang and a shudder, the %s pump goes silent." ),
1613 liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1614 } else if( here.furn( source_pos ).obj().examine == &iexamine::fvat_full ) {
1615 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the vat." ),
1616 liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1617 map_stack items_here = here.i_at( source_pos );
1618 if( items_here.empty() ) {
1619 here.furn_set( source_pos, f_fvat_empty );
1620 }
1621 }
1622 act_ref.set_to_null();
1623 }
1624 break;
1625 case LST_INFINITE_MAP:
1626 // nothing, the liquid source is infinite
1627 break;
1628 case LST_MONSTER:
1629 // liquid source charges handled in monexamine::milk_source
1630 if( liquid.charges == 0 ) {
1631 act_ref.set_to_null();
1632 }
1633 break;
1634 }
1635
1636 if( removed_charges < original_charges ) {
1637 // Transferred less than the available charges -> target must be full
1638 act_ref.set_to_null();
1639 }
1640
1641 } catch( const std::runtime_error &err ) {
1642 debugmsg( "error in activity data: \"%s\"", err.what() );
1643 act_ref.set_to_null();
1644 return;
1645 }
1646}
1647
1648void activity_handlers::firstaid_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1649{
1650 static const std::string iuse_name_string( "heal" );
1651
1652 item &it = *act->targets.front();
1653 item *used_tool = it.get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
1654 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
1655 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for healing" );
1656 act->set_to_null();
1657 return;
1658 }
1659
1660 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
1661 const heal_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const heal_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
1662 if( actor == nullptr ) {
1663 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
1664 act->set_to_null();
1665 return;
1666 }
1667
1668 // TODO: Store the patient somehow, retrieve here
1669 player &patient = *p;
1670 const hp_part healed = static_cast<hp_part>( act->values[0] );
1671 const int charges_consumed = actor->finish_using( *p, patient, *used_tool, healed );
1672 p->consume_charges( it, charges_consumed );
1673
1674 // Erase activity and values.
1675 act->set_to_null();
1676 act->values.clear();
1677}
1678
1679void activity_handlers::forage_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1680{
1681 // Don't forage if we aren't next to the bush - otherwise we get weird bugs
1682 bool next_to_bush = false;
1683 map &here = get_map();
1684 for( const tripoint &pnt : here.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
1685 if( here.getabs( pnt ) == act->placement ) {
1686 next_to_bush = true;
1687 break;
1688 }
1689 }
1690
1691 if( !next_to_bush ) {
1692 act->set_to_null();
1693 return;
1694 }
1695
1696 const int veggy_chance = rng( 1, 100 );
1697 bool found_something = false;
1698
1699 item_group_id loc;
1700 ter_str_id next_ter;
1701
1702 switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
1703 case SPRING:
1704 loc = item_group_id( "forage_spring" );
1705 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_spring" );
1706 break;
1707 case SUMMER:
1708 loc = item_group_id( "forage_summer" );
1709 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_summer" );
1710 break;
1711 case AUTUMN:
1712 loc = item_group_id( "forage_autumn" );
1713 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_autumn" );
1714 break;
1715 case WINTER:
1716 loc = item_group_id( "forage_winter" );
1717 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_winter" );
1718 break;
1719 default:
1720 debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
1721 }
1722
1723 here.ter_set( here.getlocal( act->placement ), next_ter );
1724
1725 // Survival gives a bigger boost, and Perception is leveled a bit.
1726 // Both survival and perception affect time to forage
1727
1728 ///\EFFECT_PER slightly increases forage success chance
1729 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases forage success chance
1730 if( veggy_chance < p->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 3 + p->per_cur - 2 ) {
1731 const std::vector<item *> dropped = here.put_items_from_loc( loc, p->pos(), calendar::turn );
1732 for( item *it : dropped ) {
1733 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->tname() );
1734 found_something = true;
1735 if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
1736 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON );
1737 it->poison = rng( 2, 7 );
1738 }
1739 if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_HALLU ) && !it->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
1740 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
1741 }
1742 }
1743 }
1744 // 10% to drop a item/items from this group.
1745 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1746 const std::vector<item *> dropped = here.put_items_from_loc( item_group_id( "trash_forest" ),
1747 p->pos(),
1748 calendar::turn );
1749 for( item * const &it : dropped ) {
1750 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->tname() );
1751 found_something = true;
1752 }
1753 }
1754
1755 if( !found_something ) {
1756 add_msg( _( "You didn't find anything." ) );
1757 }
1758
1759 iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( p );
1760
1761 act->set_to_null();
1762}
1763
1764void activity_handlers::generic_game_do_turn( player_activity * /*act*/, player *p )
1765{
1766 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1767 // So 30 points per play
1768 p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, 2, 60, 2_hours, 30_minutes, true );
1769 return;
1770 }
1771}
1772
1773void activity_handlers::game_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1774{
1775 item &game_item = *act->targets.front();
1776
1777 // Consume battery charges for every minute spent playing
1778 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1779 int energy = game_item.ammo_required();
1780 energy -= game_item.ammo_consume( energy, p->pos() );
1781 if( energy > 0 && game_item.has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
1782 if( p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_UPS, energy ) ) {
1783 energy = 0;
1784 }
1785 }
1786 // Morale boost from game is handled in iuse::portable_game
1787 if( energy ) {
1788 act->moves_left = 0;
1789 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), game_item.tname() );
1790 }
1791 }
1792}
1793
1794void activity_handlers::hotwire_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1795{
1796 //Grab this now, in case the vehicle gets shifted
1797 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( g->m.getlocal( tripoint( act->values[0],
1798 act->values[1],
1799 p->posz() ) ) ) ) {
1800 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
1801 const int mech_skill = act->values[2];
1802 if( mech_skill > static_cast<int>( rng( 1, 6 ) ) ) {
1803 //success
1804 veh->is_locked = false;
1805 add_msg( _( "This wire will start the engine." ) );
1806 } else if( mech_skill > static_cast<int>( rng( 0, 4 ) ) ) {
1807 //soft fail
1808 veh->is_locked = false;
1809 veh->is_alarm_on = veh->has_security_working();
1810 add_msg( _( "This wire will probably start the engine." ) );
1811 } else if( veh->is_alarm_on ) {
1812 veh->is_locked = false;
1813 add_msg( _( "By process of elimination, this wire will start the engine." ) );
1814 } else {
1815 //hard fail
1816 veh->is_alarm_on = veh->has_security_working();
1817 add_msg( _( "The red wire always starts the engine, doesn't it?" ) );
1818 }
1819 } else {
1820 debugmsg( "process_activity ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR: vehicle not found" );
1821 }
1822 act->set_to_null();
1823}
1824
1825void activity_handlers::longsalvage_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1826{
1827 static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
1828 item &main_tool = p->i_at( act->index );
1829 map &here = get_map();
1830 map_stack items = here.i_at( p->pos() );
1831 item *salvage_tool = main_tool.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
1832 if( salvage_tool == nullptr ) {
1833 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long salvage" );
1834 act->set_to_null();
1835 return;
1836 }
1837
1838 const use_function *use_fun = salvage_tool->get_use( salvage_string );
1839 const salvage_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
1840 if( actor == nullptr ) {
1841 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
1842 act->set_to_null();
1843 return;
1844 }
1845
1846 for( item &it : items ) {
1847 if( actor->valid_to_cut_up( it ) ) {
1848 item_location item_loc( map_cursor( p->pos() ), &it );
1849 actor->cut_up( *p, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
1850 return;
1851 }
1852 }
1853
1854 add_msg( _( "You finish salvaging." ) );
1855 act->set_to_null();
1856}
1857
1858void activity_handlers::make_zlave_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1859{
1860 act->set_to_null();
1861 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( p->pos() );
1862 const std::string corpse_name = act->str_values[0];
1863 item *body = nullptr;
1864
1865 for( item &it : items ) {
1866 if( it.display_name() == corpse_name ) {
1867 body = &it;
1868 }
1869 }
1870
1871 if( body == nullptr ) {
1872 add_msg( m_info, _( "There's no corpse to make into a zombie slave!" ) );
1873 return;
1874 }
1875
1876 int success = act->values[0];
1877
1878 if( success > 0 ) {
1879
1880 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 2, 5 ) );
1881 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 2, 5 ) );
1882
1883 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1884 _( "You slice muscles and tendons, and remove body parts until you're confident the zombie won't be able to attack you when it reanimates." ) );
1885
1886 body->set_var( "zlave", "zlave" );
1887 //take into account the chance that the body yet can regenerate not as we need.
1888 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1889 body->set_var( "zlave", "mutilated" );
1890 }
1891
1892 } else if( success > -20 ) {
1893
1894 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 3, 6 ) );
1895 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 3, 6 ) );
1896
1897 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1898 _( "You hack into the corpse and chop off some body parts. You think the zombie won't be able to attack when it reanimates." ) );
1899
1900 success += rng( 1, 20 );
1901
1902 if( success > 0 && !one_in( 5 ) ) {
1903 body->set_var( "zlave", "zlave" );
1904 } else {
1905 body->set_var( "zlave", "mutilated" );
1906 }
1907
1908 } else {
1909
1910 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 1, 8 ) );
1911 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, 8 ) );
1912
1913 body->mod_damage( rng( 0, body->max_damage() - body->damage() ), DT_STAB );
1914 if( body->damage() == body->max_damage() ) {
1915 body->active = false;
1916 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You cut up the corpse too much, it is thoroughly pulped." ) );
1917 } else {
1918 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1919 _( "You cut into the corpse trying to make it unable to attack, but you don't think you have it right." ) );
1920 }
1921 }
1922}
1923
1924void activity_handlers::pickaxe_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
1925{
1926 const tripoint &pos = get_map().getlocal( act->placement );
1927 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "pickaxe", sfx::get_heard_volume( pos ) );
1928 // each turn is too much
1929 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1930 //~ Sound of a Pickaxe at work!
1931 sounds::sound( pos, 30, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "CHNK! CHNK! CHNK!" ) );
1932 }
1933}
1934
1935void activity_handlers::pickaxe_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1936{
1937 map &here = get_map();
1938 const tripoint pos( here.getlocal( act->placement ) );
1939 // Invalidate the activity early to prevent a query from mod_pain()
1940 act->set_to_null();
1941 if( p->is_avatar() ) {
1942 const int helpersize = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
1943 if( here.is_bashable( pos ) && here.has_flag( flag_SUPPORTS_ROOF, pos ) &&
1944 here.ter( pos ) != t_tree ) {
1945 // Tunneling through solid rock is hungry, sweaty, tiring, backbreaking work
1946 // Betcha wish you'd opted for the J-Hammer ;P
1947 p->mod_stored_nutr( 15 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1948 p->mod_thirst( 15 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1949 if( p->has_trait( trait_STOCKY_TROGLO ) ) {
1950 // Yep, dwarves can dig longer before tiring
1951 p->mod_fatigue( 20 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1952 } else {
1953 p->mod_fatigue( 30 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1954 }
1955 p->mod_pain( std::max( 0, ( 2 * static_cast<int>( rng( 1, 3 ) ) ) - helpersize ) );
1956 } else if( here.move_cost( pos ) == 2 && g->get_levz() == 0 &&
1957 here.ter( pos ) != t_dirt && here.ter( pos ) != t_grass ) {
1958 //Breaking up concrete on the surface? not nearly as bad
1959 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - ( helpersize ) );
1960 p->mod_thirst( 5 - ( helpersize ) );
1961 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );
1962 }
1963 }
1964 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1965 _( "You finish digging." ),
1966 _( "<npcname> finishes digging." ) );
1967 here.destroy( pos, true );
1968 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1969 item &it = *act->targets.front();
1970 p->consume_charges( it, it.ammo_required() );
1971 } else {
1972 debugmsg( "pickaxe activity targets empty" );
1973 }
1974 if( resume_for_multi_activities( *p ) ) {
1975 for( item &elem : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1976 elem.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
1977 }
1978 }
1979}
1980
1981void activity_handlers::pulp_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1982{
1983 map &here = get_map();
1984 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act->placement );
1985
1986 // Stabbing weapons are a lot less effective at pulping
1987 const int cut_power = std::max( p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_CUT ),
1988 p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_STAB ) / 2 );
1989
1990 ///\EFFECT_STR increases pulping power, with diminishing returns
1991 float pulp_power = std::sqrt( ( p->str_cur + p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_BASH ) ) *
1992 ( cut_power + 1.0f ) );
1993 float pulp_effort = p->str_cur + p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_BASH );
1994 // Multiplier to get the chance right + some bonus for survival skill
1995 pulp_power *= 40 + p->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 5;
1996
1997 const int mess_radius = p->weapon.has_flag( flag_MESSY ) ? 2 : 1;
1998
1999 int moves = 0;
2000 // use this to collect how many corpse are pulped
2001 int &num_corpses = act->index;
2002 map_stack corpse_pile = here.i_at( pos );
2003 for( item &corpse : corpse_pile ) {
2004 const mtype *corpse_mtype = corpse.get_mtype();
2005 if( !corpse.is_corpse() || !corpse_mtype->has_flag( MF_REVIVES ) ||
2006 ( std::find( act->str_values.begin(), act->str_values.end(), "auto_pulp_no_acid" ) !=
2007 act->str_values.end() && corpse_mtype->bloodType().obj().has_acid ) ) {
2008 // Don't smash non-rezing corpses //don't smash acid zombies when auto pulping
2009 continue;
2010 }
2011
2012 while( corpse.damage() < corpse.max_damage() ) {
2013 // Increase damage as we keep smashing ensuring we eventually smash the target.
2014 if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
2015 corpse.inc_damage( DT_BASH );
2016 if( corpse.damage() == corpse.max_damage() ) {
2017 num_corpses++;
2018 }
2019 }
2020
2021 if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
2022 // Splatter some blood around
2023 // Splatter a bit more randomly, so that it looks cooler
2024 const int radius = mess_radius + x_in_y( pulp_power, 500 ) + x_in_y( pulp_power, 1000 );
2025 const tripoint dest( pos + point( rng( -radius, radius ), rng( -radius, radius ) ) );
2026 const field_type_id type_blood = ( mess_radius > 1 && x_in_y( pulp_power, 10000 ) ) ?
2027 corpse.get_mtype()->gibType() :
2028 corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType();
2029 here.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, pos, dest );
2030 }
2031
2032 p->mod_stamina( -pulp_effort );
2033
2034 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
2035 // Smashing may not be butchery, but it involves some zombie anatomy
2036 p->practice( skill_survival, 2, 2 );
2037 }
2038
2039 float stamina_ratio = static_cast<float>( p->get_stamina() ) / p->get_stamina_max();
2040 moves += 100 / std::max( 0.25f, stamina_ratio );
2041 if( stamina_ratio < 0.33 || p->is_npc() ) {
2042 p->moves = std::min( 0, p->moves - moves );
2043 return;
2044 }
2045 if( moves >= p->moves ) {
2046 // Enough for this turn;
2047 p->moves -= moves;
2048 return;
2049 }
2050 }
2051 corpse.set_flag( flag_PULPED );
2052 }
2053 // If we reach this, all corpses have been pulped, finish the activity
2054 act->moves_left = 0;
2055 if( num_corpses == 0 ) {
2056 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The corpse moved before you could finish smashing it!" ) );
2057 return;
2058 }
2059 // TODO: Factor in how long it took to do the smashing.
2060 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( vgettext( "The corpse is thoroughly pulped.",
2061 "The corpses are thoroughly pulped.", num_corpses ),
2062 vgettext( "<npcname> finished pulping the corpse.",
2063 "<npcname> finished pulping the corpses.", num_corpses ) );
2064}
2065
2066void activity_handlers::pulp_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2067{
2068 if( p->is_npc() ) {
2069 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( p );
2070 guy->revert_after_activity();
2071 } else {
2072 act->set_to_null();
2073 }
2074}
2075
2076void activity_handlers::reload_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2077{
2078 act->set_to_null();
2079
2080 if( act->targets.size() != 2 || act->index <= 0 ) {
2081 debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_RELOAD" );
2082 return;
2083 }
2084
2085 if( !act->targets[0] ) {
2086 debugmsg( "reload target is null, failed to reload" );
2087 return;
2088 }
2089
2090 if( !act->targets[1] ) {
2091 debugmsg( "ammo target is null, failed to reload" );
2092 return;
2093 }
2094
2095 item &reloadable = *act->targets[ 0 ];
2096 item &ammo = *act->targets[1];
2097 std::string ammo_name = ammo.tname();
2098 const int qty = act->index;
2099 const bool is_speedloader = ammo.has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER );
2100 const bool ammo_is_filthy = ammo.is_filthy();
2101
2102 if( !reloadable.reload( *p, std::move( act->targets[ 1 ] ), qty ) ) {
2103 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't reload the %s." ), reloadable.tname() );
2104 return;
2105 }
2106
2107 std::string msg = _( "You reload the %s." );
2108
2109 if( ammo_is_filthy ) {
2110 reloadable.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
2111 }
2112
2113 if( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) > 7800 ) {
2114 msg =
2115 _( "You manage to loosen some debris and make your %s somewhat operational." );
2116 reloadable.set_var( "dirt", ( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) - rng( 790, 2750 ) ) );
2117 }
2118
2119 if( reloadable.is_gun() ) {
2120 p->recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2121
2122 if( reloadable.has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) && !is_speedloader ) {
2123 for( int i = 0; i != qty; ++i ) {
2124 msg = _( "You insert one %2$s into the %1$s." );
2125 }
2126 }
2127 if( reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume > 0 ) {
2128 sfx::play_variant_sound( "reload", reloadable.typeId().str(),
2129 sfx::get_heard_volume( p->pos() ) );
2130 sounds::ambient_sound( p->pos(), reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume,
2131 sounds::sound_t::activity, reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise );
2132 }
2133 } else if( reloadable.is_watertight_container() ) {
2134 msg = _( "You refill the %s." );
2135 }
2136 add_msg( m_neutral, msg, reloadable.tname(), ammo_name );
2137}
2138
2139void activity_handlers::start_fire_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2140{
2141 static const std::string iuse_name_string( "firestarter" );
2142
2143 item &it = *act->targets.front();
2144 item *used_tool = it.get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
2145 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
2146 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for starting fire" );
2147 act->set_to_null();
2148 return;
2149 }
2150
2151 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
2152 const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>
2153 ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
2154 if( actor == nullptr ) {
2155 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
2156 act->set_to_null();
2157 return;
2158 }
2159
2160 if( it.type->can_have_charges() ) {
2161 p->consume_charges( it, it.type->charges_to_use() );
2162 }
2163 p->practice( skill_survival, act->index, 5 );
2164
2165 firestarter_actor::resolve_firestarter_use( *p, act->placement );
2166 act->set_to_null();
2167}
2168
2169void activity_handlers::start_fire_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2170{
2171 map &here = get_map();
2172 if( !here.is_flammable( act->placement ) ) {
2173 try_fuel_fire( *act, *p, true );
2174 if( !here.is_flammable( act->placement ) ) {
2175 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's nothing to light there." ) );
2176 p->cancel_activity();
2177 return;
2178 }
2179 }
2180
2181 item &firestarter = *act->targets.front();
2182 if( firestarter.has_flag( flag_REQUIRES_TINDER ) ) {
2183 if( !here.tinder_at( act->placement ) ) {
2184 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This item requires tinder to light." ) );
2185 p->cancel_activity();
2186 return;
2187 }
2188 }
2189
2190 const use_function *usef = firestarter.type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2191 if( usef == nullptr || usef->get_actor_ptr() == nullptr ) {
2192 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have lost the item you were using to start the fire." ) );
2193 p->cancel_activity();
2194 return;
2195 }
2196
2197 p->mod_moves( -p->moves );
2198 const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
2199 const float light = actor->light_mod( p->pos() );
2200 act->moves_left -= light * 100;
2201 if( light < 0.1 ) {
2202 add_msg( m_bad, _( "There is not enough sunlight to start a fire now. You stop trying." ) );
2203 p->cancel_activity();
2204 }
2205}
2206
2207static bool magic_train( player_activity *act, player *p )
2208{
2209 if( !p ) {
2210 return false;
2211 }
2212 const spell_id &sp_id = spell_id( act->name );
2213 if( sp_id.is_valid() ) {
2214 const bool knows = g->u.magic->knows_spell( sp_id );
2215 if( knows ) {
2216 spell &studying = p->magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2217 const int expert_multiplier = act->values.empty() ? 0 : act->values[0];
2218 const int xp = roll_remainder( studying.exp_modifier( *p ) * expert_multiplier );
2219 studying.gain_exp( xp );
2220 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You learn a little about the spell: %s" ),
2221 sp_id->name );
2222 } else {
2223 p->magic->learn_spell( act->name, *p );
2224 // you can decline to learn this spell , as it may lock you out of other magic.
2225 if( p->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2226 add_msg( m_good, _( "You learn %s." ), sp_id->name.translated() );
2227 } else {
2228 act->set_to_null();
2229 }
2230 }
2231 return true;
2232 }
2233 return false;
2234}
2235
2236void activity_handlers::train_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2237{
2238 const skill_id sk( act->name );
2239 if( sk.is_valid() ) {
2240 const Skill &skill = sk.obj();
2241 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2242 int old_skill_level = p->get_skill_level( sk );
2243 p->get_skill_level_object( sk ).train( 100, true );
2244 int new_skill_level = p->get_skill_level( sk );
2245 if( old_skill_level != new_skill_level ) {
2246 add_msg( m_good, _( "You finish training %s to level %d." ),
2247 skill_name, new_skill_level );
2248 g->events().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>( p->getID(), sk, new_skill_level );
2249 } else {
2250 add_msg( m_good, _( "You get some training in %s." ), skill_name );
2251 }
2252 act->set_to_null();
2253 return;
2254 }
2255
2256 const matype_id &ma_id = matype_id( act->name );
2257 if( ma_id.is_valid() ) {
2258 const martialart &mastyle = ma_id.obj();
2259 // Trained martial arts,
2260 g->events().send<event_type::learns_martial_art>( p->getID(), ma_id );
2261 p->martial_arts_data->learn_style( mastyle.id, p->is_avatar() );
2262 } else if( !magic_train( act, p ) ) {
2263 debugmsg( "train_finish without a valid skill or style or spell name" );
2264 }
2265
2266 act->set_to_null();
2267 return;
2268}
2269
2270void activity_handlers::vehicle_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2271{
2272 map &here = get_map();
2273 //Grab this now, in case the vehicle gets shifted
2274 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( tripoint( act->values[0],
2275 act->values[1],
2276 act->values[7] ) ) );
2277 veh_interact::complete_vehicle( *p );
2278 // complete_vehicle set activity type to NULL if the vehicle
2279 // was completely dismantled, otherwise the vehicle still exist and
2280 // is to be examined again.
2281 if( act->is_null() ) {
2282 if( npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( p ) ) {
2283 guy->revert_after_activity();
2284 guy->set_moves( 0 );
2285 }
2286 return;
2287 }
2288 act->set_to_null();
2289 if( !p->is_npc() ) {
2290 if( act->values.size() < 8 ) {
2291 debugmsg( "process_activity invalid ACT_VEHICLE values:%d",
2292 act->values.size() );
2293 } else {
2294 if( vp ) {
2295 here.invalidate_map_cache( g->get_levz() );
2296 // TODO: Z (and also where the activity is queued)
2297 // Or not, because the vehicle coordinates are dropped anyway
2298 if( !resume_for_multi_activities( *p ) ) {
2299 g->exam_vehicle( vp->vehicle(), point( act->values[ 2 ], act->values[ 3 ] ) );
2300 }
2301 return;
2302 } else {
2303 debugmsg( "process_activity ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found" );
2304 }
2305 }
2306 }
2307}
2308
2309void activity_handlers::hand_crank_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2310{
2311 // Hand-crank chargers seem to range from 2 watt (very common easily verified)
2312 // to 10 watt (suspicious claims from some manufacturers) sustained output.
2313 // It takes 2.4 minutes to produce 1kj at just slightly under 7 watts (25 kj per hour)
2314 // time-based instead of speed based because it's a sustained activity
2315 item &hand_crank_item = *act->targets.front();
2316
2317 if( calendar::once_every( 144_seconds ) ) {
2318 p->mod_fatigue( 1 );
2319 if( hand_crank_item.ammo_capacity() > hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() ) {
2320 hand_crank_item.ammo_set( itype_battery, hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() + 1 );
2321 } else {
2322 act->moves_left = 0;
2323 add_msg( m_info, _( "You've charged the battery completely." ) );
2324 }
2325 }
2326 if( p->get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
2327 act->moves_left = 0;
2328 add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too exhausted to keep cranking." ) );
2329 }
2330
2331}
2332
2333void activity_handlers::vibe_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2334{
2335 //Using a vibrator takes time (10 minutes), not speed
2336 //Linear increase in morale during action with a small boost at end
2337 //Deduct 1 battery charge for every minute in use, or vibrator is much less effective
2338 item &vibrator_item = *act->targets.front();
2339
2340 if( p->encumb( bp_mouth ) >= 30 ) {
2341 act->moves_left = 0;
2342 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have trouble breathing, and stop." ) );
2343 }
2344
2345 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2346 p->mod_fatigue( 1 );
2347 if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining() > 0 ) {
2348 vibrator_item.ammo_consume( 1, p->pos() );
2349 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 3, 40 );
2350 if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
2351 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), vibrator_item.tname() );
2352 }
2353 } else {
2354 //twenty minutes to fill
2355 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 1, 40 );
2356 }
2357 }
2358 // Dead Tired: different kind of relaxation needed
2359 if( p->get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
2360 act->moves_left = 0;
2361 add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too tired to continue." ) );
2362 }
2363
2364 // Vibrator requires that you be able to move around, stretch, etc, so doesn't play
2365 // well with roots. Sorry. :-(
2366}
2367
2368void activity_handlers::start_engines_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2369{
2370 act->set_to_null();
2371 // Find the vehicle by looking for a remote vehicle first, then by player relative coordinates
2372 vehicle *veh = g->remoteveh();
2373 map &here = get_map();
2374 if( !veh ) {
2375 const tripoint pos = act->placement + g->u.pos();
2376 veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( pos ) );
2377 if( !veh ) {
2378 return;
2379 }
2380 }
2381
2382 int attempted = 0;
2383 int non_muscle_attempted = 0;
2384 int started = 0;
2385 int non_muscle_started = 0;
2386 int non_combustion_started = 0;
2387 const bool take_control = act->values[0];
2388
2389 for( size_t e = 0; e < veh->engines.size(); ++e ) {
2390 if( veh->is_engine_on( e ) ) {
2391 attempted++;
2392 if( !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_muscle ) &&
2393 !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_animal ) ) {
2394 non_muscle_attempted++;
2395 }
2396 if( veh->start_engine( e ) ) {
2397 started++;
2398 if( !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_muscle ) &&
2399 !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_animal ) ) {
2400 non_muscle_started++;
2401 } else {
2402 non_combustion_started++;
2403 }
2404 }
2405 }
2406 }
2407
2408 //Did any engines start?
2409 veh->engine_on = started;
2410 //init working engine noise
2411 sfx::do_vehicle_engine_sfx();
2412
2413 if( attempted == 0 ) {
2414 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have an engine!" ), veh->name );
2415 } else if( non_muscle_attempted > 0 ) {
2416 //Some non-muscle engines tried to start
2417 if( non_muscle_attempted == non_muscle_started ) {
2418 //All of the non-muscle engines started
2419 add_msg( vgettext( "The %s's engine starts up.",
2420 "The %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2421 } else if( non_muscle_started > 0 ) {
2422 //Only some of the non-muscle engines started
2423 add_msg( vgettext( "One of the %s's engines start up.",
2424 "Some of the %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2425 } else if( non_combustion_started > 0 ) {
2426 //Non-combustions "engines" started
2427 add_msg( _( "The %s is ready for movement." ), veh->name );
2428 } else {
2429 //All of the non-muscle engines failed
2430 add_msg( m_bad, vgettext( "The %s's engine fails to start.",
2431 "The %s's engines fail to start.", non_muscle_attempted ), veh->name );
2432 }
2433 }
2434
2435 if( take_control && !veh->engine_on && !veh->velocity ) {
2436 p->controlling_vehicle = false;
2437 add_msg( _( "You let go of the controls." ) );
2438 }
2439}
2440
2441void activity_handlers::oxytorch_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2442{
2443 if( act->values[0] <= 0 ) {
2444 return;
2445 }
2446
2447 item &it = *act->targets.front();
2448 // act->values[0] is the number of charges yet to be consumed
2449 const int charges_used = std::min( act->values[0], it.ammo_required() );
2450
2451 it.ammo_consume( charges_used, p->pos() );
2452 act->values[0] -= static_cast<int>( charges_used );
2453
2454 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "oxytorch", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
2455 if( calendar::once_every( 2_turns ) ) {
2456 sounds::sound( act->placement, 10, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "hissssssssss!" ) );
2457 }
2458}
2459
2460void activity_handlers::oxytorch_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2461{
2462 act->set_to_null();
2463 map &here = get_map();
2464 const tripoint &pos = act->placement;
2465 const ter_id ter = here.ter( pos );
2466
2467 // fast players might still have some charges left to be consumed
2468 act->targets.front()->ammo_consume( act->values[0], p->pos() );
2469
2470 if( here.furn( pos ) == f_rack ) {
2471 here.furn_set( pos, f_null );
2472 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_steel_chunk, rng( 2, 6 ) );
2473 } else if( ter == t_chainfence || ter == t_chaingate_c || ter == t_chaingate_l ) {
2474 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2475 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_pipe, rng( 1, 4 ) );
2476 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_wire, rng( 4, 16 ) );
2477 } else if( ter == t_chainfence_posts ) {
2478 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2479 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_pipe, rng( 1, 4 ) );
2480 } else if( ter == t_door_metal_locked || ter == t_door_metal_c || ter == t_door_bar_c ||
2481 ter == t_door_bar_locked || ter == t_door_metal_pickable ) {
2482 here.ter_set( pos, t_mdoor_frame );
2483 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_plate, rng( 0, 1 ) );
2484 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_chunk, rng( 3, 8 ) );
2485 } else if( ter == t_window_enhanced || ter == t_window_enhanced_noglass ) {
2486 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_empty );
2487 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_plate, rng( 0, 1 ) );
2488 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_sheet_metal, rng( 1, 3 ) );
2489 } else if( ter == t_reb_cage ) {
2490 here.ter_set( pos, t_pit );
2491 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_spike, rng( 1, 19 ) );
2492 here.spawn_item( pos, itype_scrap, rng( 1, 8 ) );
2493 } else if( ter == t_bars ) {
2494 if( here.ter( pos + point_east ) == t_sewage || here.ter( pos + point_south ) ==
2495 t_sewage ||
2496 here.ter( pos + point_west ) == t_sewage || here.ter( pos + point_north ) ==
2497 t_sewage ) {
2498 here.ter_set( pos, t_sewage );
2499 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2500 } else {
2501 here.ter_set( pos, t_floor );
2502 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2503 }
2504 } else if( ter == t_window_bars_alarm ) {
2505 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_alarm );
2506 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2507 } else if( ter == t_window_bars ) {
2508 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_empty );
2509 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2510 }
2511}
2512
2513void activity_handlers::cracking_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2514{
2515 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a satisfying click, the lock on the safe opens!" ) );
2516 get_map().furn_set( act->placement, f_safe_c );
2517 act->set_to_null();
2518}
2519
2520void activity_handlers::lockpicking_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2521{
2522 item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
2523 item *it = loc.get_item();
2524 if( it == nullptr ) {
2525 debugmsg( "lockpick item location lost" );
2526 return;
2527 }
2528
2529 const ter_id ter_type = g->m.ter( act->placement );
2530 const furn_id furn_type = g->m.furn( act->placement );
2531 lockpicking_open_result lr = get_lockpicking_open_result( ter_type, furn_type );
2532 ter_id new_ter_type = lr.new_ter_type;
2533 furn_id new_furn_type = lr.new_furn_type;
2534 std::string open_message = lr.open_message;
2535
2536 if( new_ter_type == t_null && new_furn_type == f_null ) {
2537 act->set_to_null();
2538 }
2539
2540 bool destroy = false;
2541
2542 /** @EFFECT_DEX improves chances of successfully picking door lock, reduces chances of bad outcomes */
2543 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS improves chances of successfully picking door lock, reduces chances of bad outcomes */
2544 int pick_roll = 5 *
2545 ( std::pow( 1.3, p->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) +
2546 it->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) - it->damage() / 2000.0 ) +
2547 p->dex_cur / 4.0;
2548 int lock_roll = rng( 1, 120 );
2549 if( pick_roll >= lock_roll ) {
2550 g->m.has_furn( act->placement ) ?
2551 g->m.furn_set( act->placement, new_furn_type ) :
2552 static_cast<void>( g->m.ter_set( act->placement, new_ter_type ) );
2553 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, open_message );
2554 } else if( furn_type == f_gunsafe_ml && lock_roll > ( 3 * pick_roll ) ) {
2555 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your clumsy attempt jams the lock!" ) );
2556 g->m.furn_set( act->placement, furn_str_id( "f_gunsafe_mj" ) );
2557 } else if( lock_roll > ( 1.5 * pick_roll ) ) {
2558 if( it->inc_damage() ) {
2559 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2560 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you destroy your tool." ) );
2561 destroy = true;
2562 } else {
2563 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2564 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you damage your tool." ) );
2565 }
2566 } else {
2567 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it." ) );
2568 }
2569 if( ter_type == t_door_locked_alarm && ( lock_roll + dice( 1, 30 ) ) > pick_roll ) {
2570 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
2571 "alarm" );
2572 if( !g->timed_events.queued( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED ) ) {
2573 g->timed_events.add( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED, calendar::turn + 30_minutes, 0,
2574 p->global_sm_location() );
2575 }
2576 }
2577 if( destroy ) {
2578 p->i_rem( it );
2579 }
2580
2581 act->set_to_null();
2582}
2583
2584
2585// TODO (https://github.com/cataclysmbnteam/Cataclysm-BN/issues/1612):
2586// Remove that repair code after repair_activity_actor.
2587
2588enum repeat_type : int {
2589 // REPEAT_INIT should be zero. In some scenarios (veh welder), activity value default to zero.
2590 REPEAT_INIT = 0, // Haven't found repeat value yet.
2591 REPEAT_ONCE, // Repeat just once
2592 REPEAT_FOREVER, // Repeat for as long as possible
2593 REPEAT_FULL, // Repeat until damage==0
2594 REPEAT_EVENT, // Repeat until something interesting happens
2595 REPEAT_CANCEL, // Stop repeating
2596};
2597
2598static repeat_type repeat_menu( const std::string &title, repeat_type last_selection )
2599{
2600 uilist rmenu;
2601 rmenu.text = title;
2602
2603 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_ONCE, true, '1', _( "Repeat once" ) );
2604 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_FOREVER, true, '2', _( "Repeat until reinforced" ) );
2605 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_FULL, true, '3', _( "Repeat until fully repaired, but don't reinforce" ) );
2606 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_EVENT, true, '4', _( "Repeat until success/failure/level up" ) );
2607 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_INIT, true, '5', _( "Back to item selection" ) );
2608
2609 rmenu.selected = last_selection - REPEAT_ONCE;
2610 rmenu.query();
2611
2612 if( rmenu.ret >= REPEAT_INIT && rmenu.ret <= REPEAT_EVENT ) {
2613 return static_cast<repeat_type>( rmenu.ret );
2614 }
2615
2616 return REPEAT_CANCEL;
2617}
2618
2619namespace activity_handlers
2620{
2621namespace repair_activity_hack
2622{
2623
2624// Total idea is that:
2625// 1. Modify activity to make sure that repair action wouldn't search item in inventory.
2626// 2. Put coords of interesting vehicle part or furniture.
2627// 3. Before applying each stage of repair, search for possible fake item.
2628//
2629// This relies on fact that repairing with real tools
2630// never use `player_activity::coords`
2631// and use `player::activity::values` with only one item.
2632
2633namespace
2634{
2635enum class hack_type_t : int {
2636 vehicle_weldrig = 0,
2637 furniture = 1
2638};
2639
2640cata::optional<hack_type_t> get_hack_type( const player_activity &activity )
2641{
2642 // Uses real tool
2643 if( activity.values.size() < 2 ) {
2644 return cata::nullopt;
2645 }
2646 assert( !activity.coords.empty() );
2647 // Old save data, probably
2648 if( activity.values.size() == 2 ) {
2649 return hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig;
2650 }
2651 return static_cast<hack_type_t>( activity.values[2] );
2652}
2653
2654tripoint get_position( const player_activity &activity )
2655{
2656 return activity.coords.at( 0 );
2657}
2658
2659item get_fake_tool( hack_type_t hack_type, const player_activity &activity )
2660{
2661 const tripoint position = get_position( activity );
