2662 const map &m = get_map();
2663
2664 item fake_item;
2665
2666 switch( hack_type ) {
2667 case hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig: {
2668 const optional_vpart_position pos = m.veh_at( position );
2669 if( !pos ) {
2670 debugmsg( "Failed to find vehicle while using it for repair at %s", position.to_string() );
2671 return fake_item;
2672 }
2673 const vehicle &veh = pos->vehicle();
2674
2675 fake_item = item( itype_welder, calendar::turn, 0 );
2676 fake_item.charges = veh.fuel_left( itype_battery );
2677
2678 break;
2679 }
2680 case hack_type_t::furniture: {
2681 if( !m.has_furn( position ) ) {
2682 debugmsg( "Failed to find furniture while using it for repair at %s", position.to_string() );
2683 // Return nullitem in that case
2684 return fake_item;
2685 }
2686 const furn_t &furniture = m.furn( position ).obj();
2687 const itype *item_type = furniture.crafting_pseudo_item_type();
2688 if( item_type == nullptr ) {
2689 return fake_item;
2690 }
2691 if( !item_type->has_flag( "USES_GRID_POWER" ) ) {
2692 debugmsg( "Non grid powered furniture for long repairs is not supported yet." );
2693 return fake_item;
2694 }
2695
2696 const tripoint_abs_ms abspos( m.getabs( position ) );
2697 const distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
2698
2699 fake_item = item( item_type, calendar::turn, 0 );
2700 fake_item.charges = grid.get_resource( true );
2701 break;
2702 }
2703 }
2704
2705 fake_item.set_flag( "PSEUDO" );
2706 return fake_item;
2707}
2708
2709void discharge_real_power_source(
2710 hack_type_t hack_type,
2711 const tripoint &position,
2712 item &tool,
2713 const int original_charges
2714)
2715{
2716 const int used_charges = original_charges - tool.charges;
2717
2718 if( used_charges <= 0 ) {
2719 return;
2720 }
2721
2722 const map &m = get_map();
2723
2724 int unfulfilled_demand = 0;
2725 switch( hack_type ) {
2726 case hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig: {
2727 optional_vpart_position pos = m.veh_at( position );
2728 if( !pos ) {
2729 return;
2730 }
2731 vehicle &veh = pos->vehicle();
2732 unfulfilled_demand = veh.discharge_battery( used_charges );
2733 break;
2734 }
2735 case hack_type_t::furniture: {
2736 const tripoint_abs_ms abspos( m.getabs( position ) );
2737 distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
2738 unfulfilled_demand = grid.mod_resource( -used_charges );
2739 break;
2740 }
2741 }
2742 if( unfulfilled_demand != 0 ) {
2743 debugmsg(
2744 "Fake tool discharged grid/veh more than grid/veh had! Unfulfilled demand %d kJ",
2745 unfulfilled_demand
2746 );
2747 }
2748}
2749
2750} // namespace
2751
2752void patch_activity_for_vehicle_welder(
2753 player_activity &activity,
2754 const tripoint &veh_part_position,
2755 const vehicle &veh,
2756 int interact_part_idx )
2757{
2758 // Player may start another activity on welder/soldering iron
2759 // Check it here instead of vehicle interaction code
2760 // because we want to encapsulate hack here.
2761 if( activity.id() != ACT_REPAIR_ITEM ) {
2762 return;
2763 }
2764
2765 const int welding_rig_index = veh.part_with_feature( interact_part_idx, "WELDRIG", true );
2766
2767 // This tells activity, that real item doesn't exists in inventory.
2768 activity.index = INT_MIN;
2769 // Data for lookup vehicle part
2770 activity.coords = { veh_part_position };
2771 activity.values = {
2772 // Because we called only on start of repair
2773 static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REPEAT_INIT ),
2774 welding_rig_index,
2775 static_cast<int>( hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig )
2776 };
2777}
2778
2779void patch_activity_for_furniture( player_activity &activity,
2780 const tripoint &furniture_position )
2781{
2782 // Player may start another activity on welder/soldering iron
2783 // Check it here instead of furniture interaction code
2784 // because we want to encapsulate hack here.
2785 if( activity.id() != ACT_REPAIR_ITEM ) {
2786 return;
2787 }
2788
2789 // This tells activity, that real item doesn't exists in inventory.
2790 activity.index = INT_MIN;
2791 // Data for lookup furniture
2792 activity.coords = { furniture_position };
2793 activity.values = {
2794 // Because we called only on start of repair
2795 static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REPEAT_INIT ),
2796 0, // Useless for us, set only to be compatible with vehicle
2797 static_cast<int>( hack_type_t::furniture )
2798 };
2799}
2800
2801} // namespace repair_activity_hack
2802} // namespace activity_handlers
2803
2804void activity_handlers::repair_item_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2805{
2806 namespace hack = activity_handlers::repair_activity_hack;
2807
2808 const std::string iuse_name_string = act->get_str_value( 0, "repair_item" );
2809 repeat_type repeat = static_cast<repeat_type>( act->get_value( 0, REPEAT_INIT ) );
2810 item_location *ploc = nullptr;
2811 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
2812 ploc = &act->targets[0];
2813 }
2814
2815 // nullopt if used real tool
2816 cata::optional<hack::hack_type_t> hack_type = hack::get_hack_type( *act );
2817 cata::optional<item> fake_tool = cata::nullopt;
2818 if( hack_type ) {
2819 fake_tool = hack::get_fake_tool( hack_type.value(), *act );
2820 }
2821 const tripoint hack_position = hack_type ? hack::get_position( *act ) : tripoint{};
2822 const int hack_original_charges = fake_tool ? fake_tool->charges : 0;
2823
2824 item *main_tool = nullptr;
2825 if( hack_type.has_value() ) {
2826 main_tool = &fake_tool.value();
2827 }
2828 if( main_tool == nullptr && ploc ) {
2829 main_tool = & **ploc;
2830 }
2831 if( main_tool == nullptr ) {
2832 main_tool = &p->i_at( act->index );
2833 }
2834 if( main_tool == nullptr ) {
2835 debugmsg( "Failed to get main_tool for long repair" );
2836 act->set_to_null();
2837 return;
2838 }
2839
2840 item *used_tool = main_tool->get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
2841 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
2842 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long repair" );
2843 act->set_to_null();
2844 return;
2845 }
2846
2847 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
2848 // TODO: De-uglify this block. Something like get_use<iuse_actor_type>() maybe?
2849 const repair_item_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const repair_item_actor *>
2850 ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
2851 if( actor == nullptr ) {
2852 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
2853 act->set_to_null();
2854 return;
2855 }
2856
2857 // Valid Repeat choice and target, attempt repair.
2858 if( repeat != REPEAT_INIT && act->targets.size() >= 2 ) {
2859 item_location &fix_location = act->targets[1];
2860
2861 // Remember our level: we want to stop retrying on level up
2862 const int old_level = p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2863 const repair_item_actor::attempt_hint attempt = actor->repair( *p, *used_tool, fix_location );
2864 if( attempt != repair_item_actor::AS_CANT ) {
2865 if( ploc && ploc->where() == item_location::type::map ) {
2866 used_tool->ammo_consume( used_tool->ammo_required(), ploc->position() );
2867 } else {
2868 p->consume_charges( *used_tool, used_tool->ammo_required() );
2869 }
2870 if( hack_type.has_value() ) {
2871 hack::discharge_real_power_source(
2872 hack_type.value(),
2873 hack_position,
2874 *used_tool,
2875 hack_original_charges
2876 );
2877 }
2878 }
2879
2880 // TODO: Allow setting this in the actor
2881 // TODO: Don't use charges_to_use: welder has 50 charges per use, soldering iron has 1
2882 if( !used_tool->units_sufficient( *p ) ) {
2883 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s ran out of charges" ), used_tool->tname() );
2884 act->set_to_null();
2885 return;
2886 }
2887
2888 // Print message explaining why we stopped
2889 // But only if we didn't destroy the item (because then it's obvious)
2890 const bool destroyed = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_DESTROYED;
2891 const bool cannot_continue_repair = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_CANT ||
2892 destroyed || !actor->can_repair_target( *p, *fix_location, !destroyed );
2893 if( cannot_continue_repair ) {
2894 // Cannot continue to repair target, select another target.
2895 // **Warning**: as soon as the item is popped back, it is destroyed and can't be used anymore!
2896 act->targets.pop_back();
2897 }
2898
2899 const bool event_happened = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_FAILURE ||
2900 attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_SUCCESS ||
2901 old_level != p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2902
2903 const bool need_input =
2904 ( repeat == REPEAT_ONCE ) ||
2905 ( repeat == REPEAT_EVENT && event_happened ) ||
2906 ( repeat == REPEAT_FULL && ( cannot_continue_repair || fix_location->damage() <= 0 ) );
2907 if( need_input ) {
2908 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2909 }
2910 }
2911
2912 // Check tool is valid before we query target and Repeat choice.
2913 if( !actor->can_use_tool( *p, *used_tool, true ) ) {
2914 act->set_to_null();
2915 return;
2916 }
2917
2918 // target selection and validation.
2919 while( act->targets.size() < 2 ) {
2920 item_location item_loc = game_menus::inv::repair( *p, actor, main_tool );
2921
2922 if( item_loc == item_location::nowhere ) {
2923 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2924 act->set_to_null();
2925 return;
2926 }
2927 if( actor->can_repair_target( *p, *item_loc, true ) ) {
2928 act->targets.emplace_back( item_loc );
2929 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2930 }
2931 }
2932
2933 const item &fix = *act->targets[1];
2934
2935 if( repeat == REPEAT_INIT ) {
2936 const int level = p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2937 repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type = actor->default_action( fix, level );
2938 if( action_type == repair_item_actor::RT_NOTHING ) {
2939 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
2940 }
2941
2942 const std::pair<float, float> chance = actor->repair_chance( *p, fix, action_type );
2943 if( chance.first <= 0.0f ) {
2944 action_type = repair_item_actor::RT_PRACTICE;
2945 }
2946
2947 std::string title = string_format( _( "%s %s\n" ),
2948 repair_item_actor::action_description( action_type ),
2949 fix.tname() );
2950 title += string_format( _( "Charges: <color_light_blue>%s/%s</color> %s (%s per use)\n" ),
2951 used_tool->ammo_remaining(), used_tool->ammo_capacity(),
2952 item::nname( used_tool->ammo_current() ),
2953 used_tool->ammo_required() );
2954 title += string_format( _( "Skill used: <color_light_blue>%s (%s)</color>\n" ),
2955 actor->used_skill.obj().name(), level );
2956 title += string_format( _( "Success chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%\n" ),
2957 100.0f * chance.first );
2958 title += string_format( _( "Damage chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%" ),
2959 100.0f * chance.second );
2960
2961 if( act->values.empty() ) {
2962 act->values.resize( 1 );
2963 }
2964 do {
2965 repeat = repeat_menu( title, repeat );
2966
2967 if( repeat == REPEAT_CANCEL ) {
2968 act->set_to_null();
2969 return;
2970 }
2971 act->values[0] = static_cast<int>( repeat );
2972 // BACK selected, redo target selection next.
2973 if( repeat == REPEAT_INIT ) {
2974 p->activity.targets.pop_back();
2975 return;
2976 }
2977 if( repeat == REPEAT_FULL && fix.damage() <= 0 ) {
2978 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already fully repaired." ), fix.tname() );
2979 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2980 }
2981 } while( repeat == REPEAT_INIT );
2982 }
2983
2984 // Otherwise keep retrying
2985 act->moves_left = actor->move_cost;
2986}
2987
2988void activity_handlers::mend_item_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2989{
2990 act->set_to_null();
2991 if( act->targets.size() != 1 ) {
2992 debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_MEND_ITEM" );
2993 return;
2994 }
2995
2996 item_location &target = act->targets[ 0 ];
2997
2998 const auto f = target->faults.find( fault_id( act->name ) );
2999 if( f == target->faults.end() ) {
3000 debugmsg( "item %s does not have fault %s", target->tname(), act->name );
3001 return;
3002 }
3003
3004 if( act->str_values.empty() ) {
3005 debugmsg( "missing mending_method id for ACT_MEND_ITEM." );
3006 return;
3007 }
3008
3009 const mending_method *method = fault_id( act->name )->find_mending_method( act->str_values[0] );
3010 if( !method ) {
3011 debugmsg( "invalid mending_method id for ACT_MEND_ITEM." );
3012 return;
3013 }
3014
3015 const inventory inv = p->crafting_inventory();
3016 const requirement_data &reqs = method->requirements.obj();
3017 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3018 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s." ), target->tname() );
3019 }
3020 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3021 p->consume_items( e );
3022 }
3023 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3024 p->consume_tools( e );
3025 }
3026 p->invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3027
3028 target->faults.erase( *f );
3029 if( method->turns_into ) {
3030 target->faults.emplace( *method->turns_into );
3031 }
3032 // also_mends removes not just the fault picked to be mended, but this as well.
3033 if( method->also_mends ) {
3034 target->faults.erase( *method->also_mends );
3035 }
3036 if( act->name == "fault_gun_blackpowder" || act->name == "fault_gun_dirt" ) {
3037 target->set_var( "dirt", 0 );
3038 }
3039 add_msg( m_good, method->success_msg.translated(), target->tname() );
3040}
3041
3042void activity_handlers::gunmod_add_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3043{
3044 act->set_to_null();
3045 // first unpack all of our arguments
3046 if( act->values.size() != 4 ) {
3047 debugmsg( "Insufficient arguments to ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
3048 return;
3049 }
3050
3051 item &gun = *act->targets.at( 0 );
3052 item &mod = *act->targets.at( 1 );
3053
3054 // chance of success (%)
3055 const int roll = act->values[1];
3056 // chance of damage (%)
3057 const int risk = act->values[2];
3058
3059 // any tool charges used during installation
3060 const itype_id tool( act->name );
3061 const int qty = act->values[3];
3062
3063 if( !gun.is_gunmod_compatible( mod ).success() ) {
3064 debugmsg( "Invalid arguments in ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
3065 return;
3066 }
3067
3068 if( !tool.is_empty() && qty > 0 ) {
3069 p->use_charges( tool, qty );
3070 }
3071
3072 if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= roll ) {
3073 add_msg( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." ), mod.tname(),
3074 gun.tname() );
3075 gun.put_in( p->i_rem( &mod ) );
3076
3077 } else if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= risk ) {
3078 if( gun.inc_damage() ) {
3079 // Remove irremovable mods prior to destroying the gun
3080 for( item *mod : gun.gunmods() ) {
3081 if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
3082 p->remove_item( *mod );
3083 }
3084 }
3085 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and destroyed your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
3086 gun.tname() );
3087 p->i_rem( &gun );
3088 } else {
3089 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and damaged your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
3090 gun.tname() );
3091 }
3092
3093 } else {
3094 add_msg( m_info, _( "You failed at installing the %s." ), mod.tname() );
3095 }
3096}
3097
3098void activity_handlers::toolmod_add_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3099{
3100 act->set_to_null();
3101 if( act->targets.size() != 2 || !act->targets[0] || !act->targets[1] ) {
3102 debugmsg( "Incompatible arguments to ACT_TOOLMOD_ADD" );
3103 return;
3104 }
3105 item &tool = *act->targets[0];
3106 item &mod = *act->targets[1];
3107 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." ),
3108 mod.tname(), tool.tname() );
3109 mod.set_flag( "IRREMOVABLE" );
3110 tool.put_in( mod );
3111 act->targets[1].remove_item();
3112}
3113
3114void activity_handlers::clear_rubble_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3115{
3116 const tripoint &pos = act->placement;
3117 map &here = get_map();
3118 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You clear up the %s." ),
3119 here.furnname( pos ) );
3120 here.furn_set( pos, f_null );
3121
3122 act->set_to_null();
3123}
3124
3125void activity_handlers::meditate_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3126{
3127 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You pause to engage in spiritual contemplation." ) );
3128 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 5, 10 );
3129 act->set_to_null();
3130}

3134 activity_on_turn_wear( *act, *p );

3167}
3168
3169void activity_handlers::travel_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3170{
3171 if( !p->omt_path.empty() ) {
3172 p->omt_path.pop_back();
3173 if( p->omt_path.empty() ) {
3174 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
3175 act->set_to_null();
3176 return;
3177 }
3178 const tripoint_abs_omt next_omt = p->omt_path.back();
3179 tripoint_abs_ms waypoint;
3180 if( p->omt_path.size() == 1 ) {
3181 // if next omt is the final one, target its midpoint
3182 waypoint = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
3183 } else {
3184 // otherwise target the middle of the edge nearest to our current location
3185 const tripoint_abs_ms cur_omt_mid = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>
3186 ( p->global_omt_location() ) );
3187 waypoint = clamp( cur_omt_mid, project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
3188 }
3189 map &here = get_map();
3190 // TODO: fix point types
3191 tripoint centre_sub = here.getlocal( waypoint.raw() );
3192 if( !here.passable( centre_sub ) ) {
3193 tripoint_range<tripoint> candidates = here.points_in_radius( centre_sub, 2 );
3194 for( const tripoint &elem : candidates ) {
3195 if( here.passable( elem ) ) {
3196 centre_sub = elem;
3197 break;
3198 }
3199 }
3200 }
3201 const std::vector<tripoint> route_to = here.route( p->pos(), centre_sub,
3202 p->get_pathfinding_settings(),
3203 p->get_path_avoid() );
3204 if( !route_to.empty() ) {
3205 const activity_id act_travel = ACT_TRAVELLING;
3206 p->set_destination( route_to, player_activity( act_travel ) );
3207 } else {
3208 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot reach that destination" ) );
3209 }
3210 } else {
3211 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
3212 }
3213 act->set_to_null();
3214}
3215
3216void activity_handlers::armor_layers_do_turn( player_activity *, player *p )
3217{
3218 p->cancel_activity();
3219 p->sort_armor();
3220}
3221
3222void activity_handlers::atm_do_turn( player_activity *, player *p )
3223{
3224 iexamine::atm( *p, p->pos() );
3225}
3226
3227// fish-with-rod fish catching function.
3228static void rod_fish( player *p, const std::vector<monster *> &fishables )
3229{
3230 map &here = get_map();
3231 //if the vector is empty (no fish around) the player is still given a small chance to get a (let us say it was hidden) fish
3232 if( fishables.empty() ) {
3233 const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
3234 mongroup_id( "GROUP_FISH" ) );
3235 const mtype_id fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
3236 here.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), item::make_corpse( fish_mon, calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
3237 3_hours ) ) );
3238 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), fish_mon.obj().nname() );
3239 } else {
3240 monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
3241 chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
3242 if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
3243 g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, p->pos(), p, 50_hours );
3244 } else {
3245 here.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
3246 calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
3247 3_hours ) ) );
3248 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), chosen_fish->type->nname() );
3249 }
3250 }
3251 for( item &elem : here.i_at( p->pos() ) ) {
3252 if( elem.is_corpse() && !elem.has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
3253 elem.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
3254 }
3255 }
3256}
3257
3258void activity_handlers::fish_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3259{
3260 item &it = *act->targets.front();
3261 int fish_chance = 1;
3262 int survival_skill = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
3263 if( it.has_flag( flag_FISH_POOR ) ) {
3264 survival_skill += dice( 1, 6 );
3265 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_FISH_GOOD ) ) {
3266 // Much better chances with a good fishing implement.
3267 survival_skill += dice( 4, 9 );
3268 survival_skill *= 2;
3269 }
3270 std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( act->coord_set );
3271 // Fish are always there, even if it dosnt seem like they are visible!
3272 if( fishables.empty() ) {
3273 fish_chance += survival_skill / 2;
3274 } else {
3275 // if they are visible however, it implies a larger population
3276 for( monster *elem : fishables ) {
3277 fish_chance += elem->fish_population;
3278 }
3279 fish_chance += survival_skill;
3280 }
3281 // no matter the population of fish, your skill and tool limits the ease of catching.
3282 fish_chance = std::min( survival_skill * 10, fish_chance );
3283 if( x_in_y( fish_chance, 600000 ) ) {
3284 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel a tug on your line!" ) );
3285 rod_fish( p, fishables );
3286 }
3287 if( calendar::once_every( 60_minutes ) ) {
3288 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, 3 ) );
3289 }
3290
3291}
3292
3293void activity_handlers::fish_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3294{
3295 act->set_to_null();
3296 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish fishing" ) );
3297 if( !p->backlog.empty() && p->backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ) {
3298 p->backlog.clear();
3299 p->assign_activity( ACT_TIDY_UP );
3300 }
3301}
3302
3303void activity_handlers::cracking_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3304{
3305 auto cracking_tool = p->crafting_inventory().items_with( []( const item & it ) -> bool {
3306 item temporary_item( it.type );
3307 return temporary_item.has_flag( flag_SAFECRACK );
3308 } );
3309 if( cracking_tool.empty() && !p->has_bionic( bio_ears ) ) {
3310 // We lost our cracking tool somehow, bail out.
3311 act->set_to_null();
3312 return;
3313 }
3314}
3315
3316void activity_handlers::repair_item_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3317{
3318 // Moves are decremented based on a combination of speed and good vision (not in the dark, farsighted, etc)
3319 const float vision_mod = character_funcs::fine_detail_vision_mod( *p );
3320 const int effective_moves = p->moves / vision_mod;
3321 if( effective_moves <= act->moves_left ) {
3322 act->moves_left -= effective_moves;
3323 p->moves = 0;
3324 } else {
3325 p->moves -= act->moves_left * vision_mod;
3326 act->moves_left = 0;
3327 }
3328}
3329
3330void activity_handlers::butcher_do_turn( player_activity * /*act*/, player *p )
3331{
3332 p->mod_stamina( -20 );
3333}
3334
3335void activity_handlers::read_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3336{
3337 if( p->is_player() ) {
3338 if( !act->str_values.empty() && act->str_values[0] == "martial_art" && one_in( 3 ) ) {
3339 if( act->values.empty() ) {
3340 act->values.push_back( p->get_stamina() );
3341 }
3342 p->set_stamina( act->values[0] - 1 );
3343 act->values[0] = p->get_stamina();
3344 }
3345 } else {
3346 p->moves = 0;
3347 }
3348
3349 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
3350 item_location loc = act->targets[0];
3351 if( !loc || !loc->is_book() ) {
3352 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You lost your book! You stop reading." ) );
3353 act->set_to_null();
3354 }
3355 }
3356}
3357
3358void activity_handlers::read_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3359{
3360 if( !act || !act->targets.front() ) {
3361 debugmsg( "Lost target of ACT_READ" );
3362 return;
3363 }
3364 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3365 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( p );
3366 guy->finish_read( act->targets.front() );
3367 } else {
3368 if( avatar *u = dynamic_cast<avatar *>( p ) ) {
3369 u->do_read( act->targets.front() );
3370 } else {
3371 act->set_to_null();
3372 }
3373 if( !act ) {
3374 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish reading." ) );
3375 }
3376 }
3377}
3378
3379void activity_handlers::wait_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3380{
3381 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish waiting." ) );
3382 act->set_to_null();
3383}
3384
3385void activity_handlers::wait_weather_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3386{
3387 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish waiting." ) );
3388 act->set_to_null();
3389}
3390
3391void activity_handlers::find_mount_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3392{
3393 //npc only activity
3394 if( p->is_player() ) {
3395 act->set_to_null();
3396 return;
3397 }
3398 npc &guy = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *p );
3399 monster *mon = guy.chosen_mount.lock().get();
3400 if( !mon ) {
3401 act->set_to_null();
3402 guy.revert_after_activity();
3403 return;
3404 }
3405 if( rl_dist( guy.pos(), mon->pos() ) <= 1 ) {
3406 if( mon->has_effect( effect_ai_waiting ) ) {
3407 mon->remove_effect( effect_ai_waiting );
3408 }
3409 if( p->can_mount( *mon ) ) {
3410 act->set_to_null();
3411 guy.revert_after_activity();
3412 guy.chosen_mount = weak_ptr_fast<monster>();
3413 p->mount_creature( *mon );
3414 } else {
3415 act->set_to_null();
3416 guy.revert_after_activity();
3417 return;
3418 }
3419 } else {
3420 const std::vector<tripoint> route = route_adjacent( *p, guy.chosen_mount.lock()->pos() );
3421 if( route.empty() ) {
3422 act->set_to_null();
3423 guy.revert_after_activity();
3424 mon->remove_effect( effect_ai_waiting );
3425 return;
3426 } else {
3427 p->activity = player_activity();
3428 mon->add_effect( effect_ai_waiting, 40_turns );
3429 p->set_destination( route, player_activity( ACT_FIND_MOUNT ) );
3430 }
3431 }
3432}
3433
3434void activity_handlers::wait_npc_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3435{
3436 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s finishes with you" ), act->str_values[0] );
3437 act->set_to_null();
3438}
3439
3440void activity_handlers::wait_stamina_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3441{
3442 int stamina_threshold = p->get_stamina_max();
3443 if( !act->values.empty() ) {
3444 stamina_threshold = act->values[0];
3445 // remember initial stamina, only for waiting-with-threshold
3446 if( act->values.size() == 1 ) {
3447 act->values.push_back( p->get_stamina() );
3448 }
3449 }
3450 if( p->get_stamina() >= stamina_threshold ) {
3451 wait_stamina_finish( act, p );
3452 }
3453}
3454
3455void activity_handlers::wait_stamina_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3456{
3457 if( !act->values.empty() ) {
3458 const int stamina_threshold = act->values[0];
3459 const int stamina_initial = ( act->values.size() > 1 ) ? act->values[1] : p->get_stamina();
3460 if( p->get_stamina() < stamina_threshold && p->get_stamina() <= stamina_initial ) {
3461 debugmsg( "Failed to wait until stamina threshold %d reached, only at %d. You may not be regaining stamina.",
3462 act->values.front(), p->get_stamina() );
3463 }
3464 } else if( p->get_stamina() < p->get_stamina_max() ) {
3465 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You are bored of waiting, so you stop." ) );
3466 } else {
3467 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish waiting and feel refreshed." ) );
3468 }
3469 act->set_to_null();
3470}
3471
3472void activity_handlers::socialize_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3473{
3474 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "%s finishes chatting with you." ), act->str_values[0] );
3475 act->set_to_null();
3476}
3477
3478void activity_handlers::try_sleep_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3479{
3480 if( !p->has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3481 if( p->can_sleep() ) {
3482 act->set_to_null();
3483 p->fall_asleep();
3484 p->remove_value( "sleep_query" );
3485 } else if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
3486 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You toss and turn" ) );
3487 }
3488 if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
3489 try_sleep_query( act, p );
3490 }
3491 }
3492}
3493
3494void activity_handlers::try_sleep_query( player_activity *act, player *p )
3495{
3496 if( p->get_value( "sleep_query" ) == "false" ) {
3497 return;
3498 }
3499 uilist sleep_query;
3500 sleep_query.text = _( "You have trouble sleeping, keep trying?" );
3501 sleep_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop trying to fall asleep and get up." ) );
3502 sleep_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue trying to fall asleep." ) );
3503 sleep_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C',
3504 _( "Continue trying to fall asleep and don't ask again." ) );
3505 sleep_query.query();
3506 switch( sleep_query.ret ) {
3507 case UILIST_CANCEL:
3508 case 1:
3509 act->set_to_null();
3510 break;
3511 case 3:
3512 p->set_value( "sleep_query", "false" );
3513 break;
3514 case 2:
3515 default:
3516 break;
3517 }
3518}
3519
3520void activity_handlers::operation_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3521{
3522 /**
3523 - values[0]: Difficulty
3524 - values[1]: success
3525 - values[2]: max_power_level
3526 - values[3]: pl_skill
3527 - str_values[0]: install/uninstall
3528 - str_values[1]: bionic_id
3529 - str_values[2]: installer_name
3530 - str_values[3]: bool autodoc
3531 */
3532 enum operation_values_ids {
3533 operation_type = 0,
3534 cbm_id = 1,
3535 installer_name = 2,
3536 is_autodoc = 3
3537 };
3538 const bionic_id bid( act->str_values[cbm_id] );
3539 const bionic_id upbid = bid->upgraded_bionic;
3540 const bool autodoc = act->str_values[is_autodoc] == "true";
3541 const bool u_see = g->u.sees( p->pos() ) && ( !g->u.has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
3542 g->u.has_bionic( bio_painkiller ) || g->u.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) );
3543
3544 const int difficulty = act->values.front();
3545
3546 const std::vector<bodypart_id> bps = get_occupied_bodyparts( bid );
3547
3548 const time_duration half_op_duration = difficulty * 10_minutes;
3549 const time_duration message_freq = difficulty * 2_minutes;
3550 time_duration time_left = time_duration::from_turns( act->moves_left / 100 );
3551
3552 map &here = get_map();
3553 if( autodoc && here.inbounds( p->pos() ) ) {
3554 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = here.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3555 flag_AUTODOC );
3556
3557 if( !here.has_flag_furn( flag_AUTODOC_COUCH, p->pos() ) || autodocs.empty() ) {
3558 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3559 act->set_to_null();
3560
3561 if( u_see ) {
3562 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The autodoc suffers a catastrophic failure." ) );
3563
3564 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3565 _( "The Autodoc's failure damages you greatly." ),
3566 _( "The Autodoc's failure damages <npcname> greatly." ) );
3567 }
3568 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3569 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3570 p->add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_hours, bp->token, difficulty );
3571 p->apply_damage( nullptr, bp, 20 * difficulty );
3572
3573 if( u_see ) {
3574 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is ripped open." ),
3575 _( "<npcname>'s %s is ripped open." ), body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3576 }
3577
3578 if( bp == bodypart_id( "eyes" ) ) {
3579 p->add_effect( effect_blind, 1_hours, num_bp );
3580 }
3581 }
3582 } else {
3583 p->add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_hours, num_bp, difficulty );
3584 p->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 20 * difficulty );
3585 }
3586 }
3587 }
3588
3589 if( time_left > half_op_duration ) {
3590 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3591 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3592 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3593 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3594 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting your %s open." ),
3595 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting <npcname>'s %s open." ),
3596 body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3597 }
3598 }
3599 } else {
3600 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see ) {
3601 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3602 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting you open." ),
3603 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting <npcname> open." ) );
3604 }
3605 }
3606 } else if( time_left == half_op_duration ) {
3607 if( act->str_values[operation_type] == "uninstall" ) {
3608 if( u_see && autodoc ) {
3609 add_msg( m_info, _( "The Autodoc attempts to carefully extract the bionic." ) );
3610 }
3611
3612 if( p->has_bionic( bid ) ) {
3613 p->perform_uninstall( bid, act->values[0], act->values[1],
3614 units::from_joule( act->values[2] ), act->values[3] );
3615 } else {
3616 debugmsg( _( "Tried to uninstall %s, but you don't have this bionic installed." ), bid.c_str() );
3617 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3618 act->set_to_null();
3619 }
3620 } else {
3621 if( u_see && autodoc ) {
3622 add_msg( m_info, _( "The Autodoc attempts to carefully insert the bionic." ) );
3623 }
3624
3625 if( bid.is_valid() ) {
3626 p->perform_install( bid, upbid, act->values[0], act->values[1], act->values[3],
3627 act->str_values[installer_name], bid->canceled_mutations );
3628 } else {
3629 debugmsg( _( "%s is no a valid bionic_id" ), bid.c_str() );
3630 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3631 act->set_to_null();
3632 }
3633 }
3634 } else if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3635 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3636 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3637 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3638 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3639 _( "The Autodoc is stitching your %s back up." ),
3640 _( "The Autodoc is stitching <npcname>'s %s back up." ),
3641 body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3642 }
3643 }
3644 } else {
3645 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3646 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3647 _( "The Autodoc is stitching you back up." ),
3648 _( "The Autodoc is stitching <npcname> back up." ) );
3649 }
3650 }
3651 } else {
3652 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3653 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3654 _( "The Autodoc is moving erratically through the rest of its program, not actually stitching your wounds." ),
3655 _( "The Autodoc is moving erratically through the rest of its program, not actually stitching <npcname>'s wounds." ) );
3656 }
3657 }
3658
3659 // Makes sure NPC is still under anesthesia
3660 if( p->has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
3661 const time_duration remaining_time = p->get_effect_dur( effect_narcosis );
3662 if( remaining_time <= time_left ) {
3663 const time_duration top_off_time = time_left - remaining_time;
3664 p->add_effect( effect_narcosis, top_off_time );
3665 p->add_effect( effect_sleep, top_off_time );
3666 }
3667 } else {
3668 p->add_effect( effect_narcosis, time_left );
3669 p->add_effect( effect_sleep, time_left );
3670 }
3671}
3672
3673void activity_handlers::try_sleep_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3674{
3675 if( !p->has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3676 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to sleep, but can't" ) );
3677 }
3678 act->set_to_null();
3679}
3680
3681void activity_handlers::operation_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3682{
3683 map &here = get_map();
3684 if( act->str_values[3] == "true" ) {
3685 if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3686 add_msg( m_good,
3687 _( "The Autodoc returns to its resting position after successfully performing the operation." ) );
3688 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = here.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3689 flag_AUTODOC );
3690 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3691 _( "a short upbeat jingle: \"Operation successful\"" ), true,
3692 "Autodoc",
3693 "success" );
3694 } else {
3695 if( act->str_values[0] == "install" ) {
3696 add_msg( m_warning,
3697 _( "The Autodoc completes installation and activates bionic but reports about complications during operation." ) );
3698 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = here.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3699 flag_AUTODOC );
3700 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3701 _( "a sad beeping noise: \"Complications detected! Report to medical personnel immediately!\"" ),
3702 true,
3703 "Autodoc",
3704 "failure" );
3705 } else {
3706 add_msg( m_bad,
3707 _( "The Autodoc jerks back to its resting position after failing the operation." ) );
3708 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = here.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3709 flag_AUTODOC );
3710 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3711 _( "a sad beeping noise: \"Operation failed\"" ), true,
3712 "Autodoc",
3713 "failure" );
3714 }
3715
3716 }
3717 } else {
3718 if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3719 add_msg( m_good,
3720 _( "The operation is a success." ) );
3721 } else {
3722 if( act->str_values[0] == "install" ) {
3723 add_msg( m_warning,
3724 _( "Bionic was installed and activated but a complication happened during operation!" ) );
3725 } else {
3726 add_msg( m_bad,
3727 _( "The operation is a failure." ) );
3728 }
3729
3730 }
3731 }
3732 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3733 act->set_to_null();
3734}
3735
3736void activity_handlers::churn_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3737{
3738 map &here = get_map();
3739 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish churning up the earth here." ) );
3740 here.ter_set( here.getlocal( act->placement ), t_dirtmound );
3741 // Go back to what we were doing before
3742 // could be player zone activity, or could be NPC multi-farming
3743 act->set_to_null();
3744 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
3745}
3746
3747void activity_handlers::plant_seed_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3748{
3749 map &here = get_map();
3750 tripoint examp = here.getlocal( act->placement );
3751 const itype_id seed_id( act->str_values[0] );
3752 std::list<item> used_seed;
3753 if( item::count_by_charges( seed_id ) ) {
3754 used_seed = p->use_charges( seed_id, 1 );
3755 } else {
3756 used_seed = p->use_amount( seed_id, 1 );
3757 }
3758 if( !used_seed.empty() ) {
3759 used_seed.front().set_age( 0_turns );
3760 if( used_seed.front().has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
3761 used_seed.front().erase_var( "activity_var" );
3762 }
3763 used_seed.front().set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_ITEM );
3764 here.add_item_or_charges( examp, used_seed.front() );
3765 if( here.has_flag_furn( flag_PLANTABLE, examp ) ) {
3766 here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id( here.furn( examp )->plant->transform ) );
3767 } else {
3768 here.set( examp, t_dirt, f_plant_seed );
3769 }
3770 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You plant some %s." ), _( "<npcname> plants some %s." ),
3771 item::nname( seed_id ) );
3772 }
3773 // Go back to what we were doing before
3774 // could be player zone activity, or could be NPC multi-farming
3775 act->set_to_null();
3776 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
3777}
3778
3779void activity_handlers::build_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3780{
3781 map &here = get_map();
3782 partial_con *pc = here.partial_con_at( here.getlocal( act->placement ) );
3783 // Maybe the player and the NPC are working on the same construction at the same time
3784 if( !pc ) {
3785 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3786 // if player completes the work while NPC still in activity loop
3787 p->activity = player_activity();
3788 p->set_moves( 0 );
3789 } else {
3790 p->cancel_activity();
3791 }
3792 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s did not find an unfinished construction at the activity spot." ),
3793 p->disp_name() );
3794 return;
3795 }
3796 // if you ( or NPC ) are finishing someone else's started construction...
3797 const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
3798 if( !p->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !p->meets_skill_requirements( built ) ) {
3799 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't work on this construction anymore." ), p->disp_name() );
3800 p->cancel_activity();
3801 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3802 p->activity = player_activity();
3803 p->set_moves( 0 );
3804 }
3805 return;
3806 }
3807 // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3808 // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6732000 )
3809 const int old_counter = pc->counter;
3810
3811 // Base moves for construction with no speed modifier or assistants
3812 // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3813 const double base_total_moves = std::max( 1, to_moves<int>( built.time ) );
3814 // Current expected total moves, includes construction speed modifiers and assistants
3815 const double cur_total_moves = std::max( 1, built.adjusted_time() );
3816 // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed
3817 const double delta_progress = p->get_moves() * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3818 // Current progress in moves
3819 const double current_progress = old_counter * base_total_moves / 10000000.0 +
3820 delta_progress;
3821 // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3822 pc->counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10000000.0 );
3823
3824 p->set_moves( 0 );
3825
3826 pc->counter = std::min( pc->counter, 10000000 );
3827 // If construction_progress has reached 100% or more
3828 if( pc->counter >= 10000000 ) {
3829 // Activity is canceled in complete_construction()
3830 complete_construction( *p );
3831 }
3832}
3833
3834void activity_handlers::tidy_up_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3835{
3836 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3837}
3838

3842}

3845{
3846 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3847}

3850{
3851 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3852}

3855{

3857}
3858
3859void activity_handlers::multiple_butcher_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3860{
3861 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3862}

3864void activity_handlers::vehicle_deconstruction_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3865{
3866 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3867}
3868
3869void activity_handlers::vehicle_repair_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3870{
3871 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3872}
3873
3874void activity_handlers::chop_trees_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3875{
3876 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3877}
3878
3879void activity_handlers::multiple_farm_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3880{
3881 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3882}
3883
3884void activity_handlers::fetch_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3885{
3886 generic_multi_activity_handler( *act, *p );
3887}
3888
3889void activity_handlers::craft_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3890{
3891 item *craft = act->targets.front().get_item();
3892
3893 // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3894 if( !craft ) {
3895 p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
3896 _( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
3897 "You stop crafting. "
3898 "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting." ),
3899 _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "
3900 "<npcname> stops crafting." ) );
3901 p->cancel_activity();
3902 return;
3903 }
3904
3905 if( !craft->is_craft() ) {
3906 debugmsg( "ACT_CRAFT target '%s' is not a craft. Aborting ACT_CRAFT.", craft->tname() );
3907 p->cancel_activity();
3908 return;
3909 }
3910
3911 if( !p->can_continue_craft( *craft ) ) {
3912 p->cancel_activity();
3913 return;
3914 }
3915
3916 const recipe &rec = craft->get_making();
3917 const tripoint bench_pos = act->coords.front();
3918 // Ugly
3919 bench_type bench_t = bench_type( act->values[1] );
3920 const float crafting_speed = crafting_speed_multiplier( *p, *craft, bench_location{bench_t, bench_pos} );
3921 const int assistants = p->available_assistant_count( craft->get_making() );
3922 const bool is_long = act->values[0];
3923
3924 if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
3925 p->cancel_activity();
3926 return;
3927 }
3928
3929 // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3930 // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6'732'000 )
3931 const int old_counter = craft->item_counter;
3932
3933 // Base moves for batch size with no speed modifier or assistants
3934 // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3935 const double base_total_moves = std::max( 1, rec.batch_time( craft->charges, 1.0f, 0 ) );
3936 // Current expected total moves, includes crafting speed modifiers and assistants
3937 const double cur_total_moves = std::max( 1, rec.batch_time( craft->charges, crafting_speed,
3938 assistants ) );
3939 // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed
3940 const double delta_progress = p->get_moves() * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3941 // Current progress in moves
3942 const double current_progress = craft->item_counter * base_total_moves / 10'000'000.0 +
3943 delta_progress;
3944 // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3945 craft->item_counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10'000'000.0 );
3946 p->set_moves( 0 );
3947
3948 // This is to ensure we don't over count skill steps
3949 craft->item_counter = std::min( craft->item_counter, 10'000'000 );
3950
3951 // Skill and tools are gained/consumed after every 5% progress
3952 int five_percent_steps = craft->item_counter / 500'000 - old_counter / 500'000;
3953 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3954 p->craft_skill_gain( *craft, five_percent_steps );
3955 }
3956
3957 // Unlike skill, tools are consumed once at the start and should not be consumed at the end
3958 if( craft->item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3959 --five_percent_steps;
3960 }
3961
3962 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3963 if( !p->craft_consume_tools( *craft, five_percent_steps, false ) ) {
3964 // So we don't skip over any tool comsuption
3965 craft->item_counter -= craft->item_counter % 500000 + 1;
3966 p->cancel_activity();
3967 return;
3968 }
3969 }
3970
3971 // if item_counter has reached 100% or more
3972 if( craft->item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3973 item craft_copy = *craft;
3974 act->targets.front().remove_item();
3975 p->cancel_activity();
3976 complete_craft( *p, craft_copy, bench_location{bench_t, bench_pos} );
3977 if( is_long ) {
3978 if( p->making_would_work( p->lastrecipe, craft_copy.charges ) ) {
3979 p->last_craft->execute( bench_pos );
3980 }
3981 }
3982 } else if( craft->item_counter >= craft->get_next_failure_point() ) {
3983 bool destroy = craft->handle_craft_failure( *p );
3984 // If the craft needs to be destroyed, do it and stop crafting.
3985 if( destroy ) {
3986 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "There is nothing left of the %s to craft from." ),
3987 _( "There is nothing left of the %s <npcname> was crafting." ), craft->tname() );
3988 act->targets.front().remove_item();
3989 p->cancel_activity();
3990 }
3991 }
3992}
3993
3994void activity_handlers::vibe_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3995{
3996 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel much better." ) );
3997 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 10, 40 );
3998 act->set_to_null();
3999}
4000
4001void activity_handlers::atm_finish( player_activity *act, player * )
4002{
4003 // ATM sets index to 0 to indicate it's finished.
4004 if( !act->index ) {
4005 act->set_to_null();
4006 }
4007}

4010{
4011 // Only exists to keep the eat activity alive between turns
4012 return;
4013}
4014
4015void activity_handlers::hacksaw_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
4016{
4017 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hacksaw", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
4018 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4019 //~ Sound of a metal sawing tool at work!
4020 sounds::sound( act->placement, 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "grnd grnd grnd" ) );
4021 }
4022}
4023
4024void activity_handlers::hacksaw_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4025{
4026 const tripoint &pos = act->placement;
4027 map &here = get_map();
4028 const ter_id ter = here.ter( pos );
4029
4030 if( here.furn( pos ) == f_rack ) {
4031 here.furn_set( pos, f_null );
4032 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 3 ) );
4033 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_steel_chunk );
4034 } else if( ter == t_chainfence || ter == t_chaingate_c || ter == t_chaingate_l ) {
4035 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
4036 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 6 );
4037 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_wire, 20 );
4038 } else if( ter == t_chainfence_posts ) {
4039 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
4040 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 6 );
4041 } else if( ter == t_window_bars_alarm ) {
4042 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_alarm );
4043 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 6 );
4044 } else if( ter == t_window_bars ) {
4045 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_empty );
4046 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 6 );
4047 } else if( ter == t_window_enhanced ) {
4048 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_reinforced );
4049 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_spike, rng( 1, 4 ) );
4050 } else if( ter == t_window_enhanced_noglass ) {
4051 here.ter_set( pos, t_window_reinforced_noglass );
4052 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_spike, rng( 1, 4 ) );
4053 } else if( ter == t_reb_cage ) {
4054 here.ter_set( pos, t_pit );
4055 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_spike, 19 );
4056 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_scrap, 8 );
4057 } else if( ter == t_bars ) {
4058 if( here.ter( pos + point_east ) == t_sewage || here.ter( pos + point_south )
4059 == t_sewage ||
4060 here.ter( pos + point_west ) == t_sewage || here.ter( pos + point_north ) ==
4061 t_sewage ) {
4062 here.ter_set( pos, t_sewage );
4063 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 3 );
4064 } else {
4065 here.ter_set( pos, t_floor );
4066 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 3 );
4067 }
4068 } else if( ter == t_door_bar_c || ter == t_door_bar_locked ) {
4069 here.ter_set( pos, t_mdoor_frame );
4070 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, 12 );
4071 }
4072
4073 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 );
4074 p->mod_thirst( 5 );
4075 p->mod_fatigue( 10 );
4076 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish cutting the metal." ) );
4077
4078 act->set_to_null();
4079}
4080
4081void activity_handlers::pry_nails_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
4082{
4083 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hammer", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
4084}
4085
4086void activity_handlers::pry_nails_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4087{
4088 const tripoint &pnt = act->placement;
4089 map &here = get_map();
4090 const ter_id type = here.ter( pnt );
4091
4092 int nails = 0;
4093 int boards = 0;
4094 ter_id newter;
4095 if( type == t_fence ) {
4096 nails = 6;
4097 boards = 3;
4098 newter = t_fence_post;
4099 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pry out the fence post." ) );
4100 } else if( type == t_window_boarded ) {
4101 nails = 8;
4102 boards = 4;
4103 newter = t_window_frame;
4104 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pry the boards from the window." ) );
4105 } else if( type == t_window_boarded_noglass ) {
4106 nails = 8;
4107 boards = 4;
4108 newter = t_window_empty;
4109 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pry the boards from the window frame." ) );
4110 } else if( type == t_door_boarded || type == t_door_boarded_damaged ||
4111 type == t_rdoor_boarded || type == t_rdoor_boarded_damaged ||
4112 type == t_door_boarded_peep || type == t_door_boarded_damaged_peep ) {
4113 nails = 8;
4114 boards = 4;
4115 if( type == t_door_boarded ) {
4116 newter = t_door_c;
4117 } else if( type == t_door_boarded_damaged ) {
4118 newter = t_door_b;
4119 } else if( type == t_door_boarded_peep ) {
4120 newter = t_door_c_peep;
4121 } else if( type == t_door_boarded_damaged_peep ) {
4122 newter = t_door_b_peep;
4123 } else if( type == t_rdoor_boarded ) {
4124 newter = t_rdoor_c;
4125 } else { // if (type == t_rdoor_boarded_damaged)
4126 newter = t_rdoor_b;
4127 }
4128 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pry the boards from the door." ) );
4129 }
4130 p->practice( skill_fabrication, 1, 1 );
4131 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_nail, 0, nails );
4132 here.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_2x4, boards );
4133 here.ter_set( pnt, newter );
4134 act->set_to_null();
4135}
4136
4137void activity_handlers::chop_tree_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4138{
4139 map &here = get_map();
4140 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "axe", sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act->placement ) ) );
4141 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4142 //~ Sound of a wood chopping tool at work!
4143 sounds::sound( here.getlocal( act->placement ), 15, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "CHK!" ) );
4144 }
4145 if( calendar::once_every( 6_minutes ) ) {
4146 p->mod_fatigue( 1 );
4147 }
4148 if( calendar::once_every( 12_minutes ) ) {
4149 p->mod_stored_nutr( 1 );
4150 p->mod_thirst( 1 );
4151 }
4152}
4153
4154void activity_handlers::chop_tree_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4155{
4156 map &here = get_map();
4157 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act->placement );
4158
4159 tripoint direction;
4160 if( !p->is_npc() ) {
4161 if( p->backlog.empty() || p->backlog.front().id() != ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) {
4162 while( true ) {
4163 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction(
4164 _( "Select a direction for the tree to fall in." ) ) ) {
4165 direction = *dir;
4166 break;
4167 }
4168 // try again
4169 }
4170 }
4171 } else {
4172 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
4173 bool cantuse = false;
4174 tripoint direc = elem - pos;
4175 tripoint proposed_to = pos + point( 3 * direction.x, 3 * direction.y );
4176 std::vector<tripoint> rough_tree_line = line_to( pos, proposed_to );
4177 for( const tripoint &elem : rough_tree_line ) {
4178 if( g->critter_at( elem ) ) {
4179 cantuse = true;
4180 break;
4181 }
4182 }
4183 if( !cantuse ) {
4184 direction = direc;
4185 }
4186 }
4187 }
4188
4189 const tripoint to = pos + 3 * direction.xy() + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) );
4190 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( pos, to, rng( 1, 8 ) );
4191 for( const tripoint &elem : tree ) {
4192 here.batter( elem, 300, 5 );
4193 here.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
4194 }
4195
4196 here.ter_set( pos, t_stump );
4197 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping down a tree." ) );
4198 // sound of falling tree
4199 sfx::play_variant_sound( "misc", "timber",
4200 sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act->placement ) ) );
4201 act->set_to_null();
4202 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4203}
4204
4205void activity_handlers::chop_logs_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4206{
4207 map &here = get_map();
4208 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act->placement );
4209 int log_quan;
4210 int stick_quan;
4211 int splint_quan;
4212 if( here.ter( pos ) == t_trunk ) {
4213 log_quan = rng( 2, 3 );
4214 stick_quan = rng( 0, 1 );
4215 splint_quan = 0;
4216 } else if( here.ter( pos ) == t_stump ) {
4217 log_quan = rng( 0, 2 );
4218 stick_quan = 0;
4219 splint_quan = rng( 5, 15 );
4220 } else {
4221 log_quan = 0;
4222 stick_quan = 0;
4223 splint_quan = 0;
4224 }
4225 for( int i = 0; i != log_quan; ++i ) {
4226 item obj( itype_log, calendar::turn );
4227 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
4228 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
4229 }
4230 for( int i = 0; i != stick_quan; ++i ) {
4231 item obj( itype_stick_long, calendar::turn );
4232 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
4233 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
4234 }
4235 for( int i = 0; i != splint_quan; ++i ) {
4236 item obj( itype_splinter, calendar::turn );
4237 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
4238 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
4239 }
4240 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
4241 const int helpersize = p->get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
4242 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - helpersize );
4243 p->mod_thirst( 5 - helpersize );
4244 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );
4245 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping wood." ) );
4246
4247 act->set_to_null();
4248 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4249}
4250
4251void activity_handlers::chop_planks_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4252{
4253 const int max_planks = 10;
4254 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION increases number of planks cut from a log */
4255 int planks = normal_roll( 2 + p->get_skill_level( skill_id( "fabrication" ) ), 1 );
4256 int wasted_planks = max_planks - planks;
4257 int scraps = rng( wasted_planks, wasted_planks * 3 );
4258 planks = std::min( planks, max_planks );
4259
4260 map &here = get_map();
4261 if( planks > 0 ) {
4262 here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act->placement ), itype_2x4, planks, 0, calendar::turn );
4263 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You produce %d planks." ), planks );
4264 }
4265 if( scraps > 0 ) {
4266 here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act->placement ), itype_splinter, scraps, 0, calendar::turn );
4267 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You produce %d splinters." ), scraps );
4268 }
4269 if( planks < max_planks / 2 ) {
4270 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You waste a lot of the wood." ) );
4271 }
4272 act->set_to_null();
4273 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4274}
4275
4276void activity_handlers::jackhammer_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
4277{
4278 map &here = get_map();
4279 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "jackhammer",
4280 sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act->placement ) ) );
4281 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4282 sounds::sound( here.getlocal( act->placement ), 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity,
4283 //~ Sound of a jackhammer at work!
4284 _( "TATATATATATATAT!" ) );
4285 }
4286}
4287
4288void activity_handlers::jackhammer_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4289{
4290 map &here = get_map();
4291 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act->placement );
4292
4293 here.destroy( pos, true );
4294
4295 if( p->is_avatar() ) {
4296 const int helpersize = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
4297 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - helpersize );
4298 p->mod_thirst( 5 - helpersize );
4299 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );
4300 }
4301 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
4302 _( "You finish drilling." ),
4303 _( "<npcname> finishes drilling." ) );
4304 act->set_to_null();
4305 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
4306 item &it = *act->targets.front();
4307 p->consume_charges( it, it.ammo_required() );
4308 } else {
4309 debugmsg( "jackhammer activity targets empty" );
4310 }
4311 if( resume_for_multi_activities( *p ) ) {
4312 for( item &elem : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
4313 elem.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
4314 }
4315 }
4316}
4317
4318void activity_handlers::fill_pit_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
4319{
4320 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "shovel", 100 );
4321 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4322 //~ Sound of a shovel filling a pit or mound at work!
4323 sounds::sound( act->placement, 10, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "hsh!" ) );
4324 }
4325}
4326
4327void activity_handlers::fill_pit_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4328{
4329 const tripoint &pos = act->placement;
4330 map &here = get_map();
4331 const ter_id ter = here.ter( pos );
4332 const ter_id old_ter = ter;
4333
4334 if( ter == t_pit || ter == t_pit_spiked || ter == t_pit_glass ||
4335 ter == t_pit_corpsed ) {
4336 here.ter_set( pos, t_pit_shallow );
4337 } else {
4338 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
4339 }
4340 const int helpersize = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
4341 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - helpersize );
4342 p->mod_thirst( 5 - helpersize );
4343 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );
4344 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish filling up %s." ), old_ter.obj().name() );
4345
4346 act->set_to_null();
4347}
4348
4349void activity_handlers::play_with_pet_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4350{
4351 p->add_morale( MORALE_PLAY_WITH_PET, rng( 3, 10 ), 10, 5_hours, 25_minutes );
4352 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Playing with your %s has lifted your spirits a bit." ),
4353 act->str_values[0] );
4354 act->set_to_null();
4355}
4356
4357void activity_handlers::shaving_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4358{
4359 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You open up your kit and shave." ) );
4360 p->add_morale( MORALE_SHAVE, 8, 8, 240_minutes, 3_minutes );
4361 act->set_to_null();
4362}
4363
4364void activity_handlers::haircut_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4365{
4366 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You give your hair a trim." ) );
4367 p->add_morale( MORALE_HAIRCUT, 3, 3, 480_minutes, 3_minutes );
4368 act->set_to_null();
4369}
4370
4371std::vector<tripoint> get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( const tripoint &abspos,
4372 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &tiles )
4373{
4374 const auto cmp = [abspos]( tripoint a, tripoint b ) {
4375 const int da = rl_dist( abspos, a );
4376 const int db = rl_dist( abspos, b );
4377
4378 return da < db;
4379 };
4380
4381 std::vector<tripoint> sorted( tiles.begin(), tiles.end() );
4382 std::sort( sorted.begin(), sorted.end(), cmp );
4383
4384 return sorted;
4385}
4386
4387template<typename fn>
4388static void cleanup_tiles( std::unordered_set<tripoint> &tiles, fn &cleanup )
4389{
4390 auto it = tiles.begin();
4391 map &here = get_map();
4392 while( it != tiles.end() ) {
4393 auto current = it++;
4394
4395 const tripoint &tile_loc = here.getlocal( *current );
4396
4397 if( cleanup( tile_loc ) ) {
4398 tiles.erase( current );
4399 }
4400 }
4401}
4402
4403static void perform_zone_activity_turn( player *p,
4404 const zone_type_id &ztype,
4405 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> &tile_filter,
4406 const std::function<void ( player &p, const tripoint & )> &tile_action,
4407 const std::string &finished_msg )
4408{
4409 const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
4410 map &here = get_map();
4411 const tripoint abspos = here.getabs( p->pos() );
4412 std::unordered_set<tripoint> unsorted_tiles = mgr.get_near( ztype, abspos );
4413
4414 cleanup_tiles( unsorted_tiles, tile_filter );
4415
4416 // sort remaining tiles by distance
4417 const std::vector<tripoint> &tiles = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, unsorted_tiles );
4418
4419 for( const tripoint &tile : tiles ) {
4420 const tripoint &tile_loc = here.getlocal( tile );
4421
4422 std::vector<tripoint> route = here.route( p->pos(), tile_loc, p->get_pathfinding_settings(),
4423 p->get_path_avoid() );
4424 if( route.size() > 1 ) {
4425 route.pop_back();
4426
4427 p->set_destination( route, p->activity );
4428 p->activity.set_to_null();
4429 return;
4430 } else {
4431 // we are at destination already
4432 /* Perform action */
4433 tile_action( *p, tile_loc );
4434 if( p->moves <= 0 ) {
4435 return;
4436 }
4437 }
4438 }
4439 add_msg( m_info, finished_msg );
4440 p->activity.set_to_null();
4441}
4442
4443void activity_handlers::fertilize_plot_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4444{
4445 itype_id fertilizer;
4446 auto check_fertilizer = [&]( bool ask_user = true ) -> void {
4447 if( act->str_values.empty() )
4448 {
4449 act->str_values.push_back( "" );
4450 }
4451 fertilizer = itype_id( act->str_values[0] );
4452
4453 /* If unspecified, or if we're out of what we used before, ask */
4454 if( ask_user && ( fertilizer.is_empty() || !p->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 ) ) )
4455 {
4456 fertilizer = iexamine::choose_fertilizer( *p, "plant",
4457 false /* Don't confirm action with player */ );
4458 act->str_values[0] = fertilizer.str();
4459 }
4460 };
4461
4462 auto have_fertilizer = [&]() {
4463 return !fertilizer.is_empty() && p->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
4464 };
4465
4466 const auto reject_tile = [&]( const tripoint & tile ) {
4467 check_fertilizer();
4468 ret_val<bool> can_fert = iexamine::can_fertilize( *p, tile, fertilizer );
4469 return !can_fert.success();
4470 };
4471
4472 const auto fertilize = [&]( player & p, const tripoint & tile ) {
4473 check_fertilizer();
4474 if( have_fertilizer() ) {
4475 iexamine::fertilize_plant( p, tile, fertilizer );
4476 if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
4477 add_msg( m_info, _( "You have run out of %s." ), item::nname( fertilizer ) );
4478 }
4479 }
4480 };
4481
4482 check_fertilizer();
4483 if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
4484 act->set_to_null();
4485 return;
4486 }
4487
4488 perform_zone_activity_turn( p,
4489 zone_type_FARM_PLOT,
4490 reject_tile,
4491 fertilize,
4492 _( "You fertilized every plot you could." ) );
4493}
4494
4495void activity_handlers::robot_control_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4496{
4497 if( act->monsters.empty() ) {
4498 debugmsg( "No monster assigned in ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL" );
4499 act->set_to_null();
4500 return;
4501 }
4502 const shared_ptr_fast<monster> z = act->monsters[0].lock();
4503
4504 if( !z || !iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( p, *z ) ) {
4505 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Target lost. IFF override failed." ) );
4506 act->set_to_null();
4507 return;
4508 }
4509
4510 // TODO: Add some kind of chance of getting the target's attention
4511}
4512
4513void activity_handlers::robot_control_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4514{
4515 act->set_to_null();
4516
4517 if( act->monsters.empty() ) {
4518 debugmsg( "No monster assigned in ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL" );
4519 return;
4520 }
4521
4522 shared_ptr_fast<monster> z = act->monsters[0].lock();
4523 act->monsters.clear();
4524
4525 if( !z || !iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( p, *z ) ) {
4526 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Target lost. IFF override failed." ) );
4527 return;
4528 }
4529
4530 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unleash your override attack on the %s." ), z->name() );
4531
4532 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
4533 /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
4534 const int computer_skill = p->get_skill_level( skill_id( "computer" ) );
4535 const float randomized_skill = rng( 2, p->int_cur ) + computer_skill;
4536 float success = computer_skill - 3 * z->type->difficulty / randomized_skill;
4537 if( z->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
4538 success = randomized_skill - rng( 1, 11 );
4539 }
4540 // rideable mechs are not hostile, they have no AI, they do not resist control as much.
4541 if( success >= 0 ) {
4542 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully override the %s's IFF protocols!" ),
4543 z->name() );
4544 z->friendly = -1;
4545 if( z->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
4546 z->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
4547 }
4548 } else if( success >= -2 ) {
4549 //A near success
4550 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s short circuits as you attempt to reprogram it!" ), z->name() );
4551 //damage it a little
4552 z->apply_damage( p, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 1, 10 ) );
4553 if( z->is_dead() ) {
4554 p->practice( skill_id( "computer" ), 10 );
4555 // Do not do the other effects if the robot died
4556 return;
4557 }
4558 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4559 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "and turns friendly!" ) );
4560 //did the robot became friendly permanently?
4561 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4562 //it did
4563 z->friendly = -1;
4564 } else {
4565 // it didn't
4566 z->friendly = rng( 5, 40 );
4567 }
4568 }
4569 } else {
4570 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "but the robot refuses to acknowledge you as an ally!" ) );
4571 }
4572 p->practice( skill_computer, 10 );
4573}
4574
4575void activity_handlers::tree_communion_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4576{
4577 // There's an initial rooting process.
4578 if( act->values.front() > 0 ) {
4579 act->values.front() -= 1;
4580 if( act->values.front() == 0 ) {
4581 if( p->has_trait( trait_id( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) ) {
4582 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The ancient tree spirits answer your call." ) );
4583 } else {
4584 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your communion with the trees has begun." ) );
4585 }
4586 }
4587 return;
4588 }
4589 // Information is received every minute.
4590 if( !calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4591 return;
4592 }
4593 // Breadth-first search forest tiles until one reveals new overmap tiles.
4594 std::queue<tripoint_abs_omt> q;
4595 std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_omt> seen;
4596 tripoint_abs_omt loc = p->global_omt_location();
4597 q.push( loc );
4598 seen.insert( loc );
4599 const std::function<bool( const oter_id & )> filter = []( const oter_id & ter ) {
4600 return ter.obj().is_wooded() || ter.obj().get_name() == "field";
4601 };
4602 while( !q.empty() ) {
4603 tripoint_abs_omt tpt = q.front();
4604 if( overmap_buffer.reveal( tpt, 3, filter ) ) {
4605 if( p->has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) {
4606 p->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 2, 30, 8_hours, 6_hours );
4607 } else {
4608 p->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 1, 15, 2_hours, 1_hours );
4609 }
4610 if( one_in( 128 ) ) {
4611 p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", SNIPPET.random_from_category( "tree_communion" ).value_or(
4612 translation() ) );
4613 }
4614 return;
4615 }
4616 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &neighbor : points_in_radius( tpt, 1 ) ) {
4617 if( seen.find( neighbor ) != seen.end() ) {
4618 continue;
4619 }
4620 seen.insert( neighbor );
4621 if( !overmap_buffer.ter( neighbor ).obj().is_wooded() ) {
4622 continue;
4623 }
4624 q.push( neighbor );
4625 }
4626 q.pop();
4627 }
4628 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The trees have shown you what they will." ) );
4629 act->set_to_null();
4630}
4631
4632static void blood_magic( player *p, int cost )
4633{
4634 std::vector<uilist_entry> uile;
4635 std::vector<bodypart_id> parts;
4636 int i = 0;
4637 for( const bodypart_id &bp : p->get_all_body_parts( true ) ) {
4638 const int hp_cur = p->get_part_hp_cur( bp );
4639 uilist_entry entry( i, hp_cur > cost, i + 49, body_part_hp_bar_ui_text( bp ) );
4640
4641 const std::pair<std::string, nc_color> &hp = get_hp_bar( hp_cur, p->get_part_hp_max( bp ) );
4642 entry.ctxt = colorize( hp.first, hp.second );
4643 uile.emplace_back( entry );
4644 parts.push_back( bp );
4645 i++;
4646 }
4647 int action = -1;
4648 while( action < 0 ) {
4649 action = uilist( _( "Choose part\nto draw blood from." ), uile );
4650 }
4651 p->mod_part_hp_cur( parts[action], - cost );
4652 p->mod_pain( std::max( 1, cost / 3 ) );
4653}
4654
4655void activity_handlers::spellcasting_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4656{
4657 act->set_to_null();
4658 const int level_override = act->get_value( 0 );
4659 spell_id sp( act->name );
4660
4661 // if level is -1 then we know it's a player spell, otherwise we build it from the ground up
4662 spell temp_spell( sp );
4663 spell &spell_being_cast = ( level_override == -1 ) ? p->magic->get_spell( sp ) : temp_spell;
4664
4665 // if level != 1 then we need to set the spell's level
4666 if( level_override != -1 ) {
4667 while( spell_being_cast.get_level() < level_override && !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() ) {
4668 spell_being_cast.gain_level();
4669 }
4670 }
4671
4672 const bool no_fail = act->get_value( 1 ) == 1;
4673 const bool no_mana = act->get_value( 2 ) == 0;
4674
4675 // choose target for spell (if the spell has a range > 0)
4676
4677 tripoint target = p->pos();
4678 bool target_is_valid = false;
4679 if( spell_being_cast.range() > 0 && !spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_none ) &&
4680 !spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4681 do {
4682 avatar &you = *p->as_avatar();
4683 std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = target_handler::mode_spell( you, spell_being_cast, no_fail,
4684 no_mana );
4685
4686 if( !trajectory.empty() ) {
4687 target = trajectory.back();
4688 target_is_valid = spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( *p, target );
4689 if( !( spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_ground ) || p->sees( target ) ) ) {
4690 target_is_valid = false;
4691 }
4692 } else {
4693 target_is_valid = false;
4694 }
4695 if( !target_is_valid ) {
4696 if( query_yn( _( "Stop casting spell? Time spent will be lost." ) ) ) {
4697 return;
4698 }
4699 }
4700 } while( !target_is_valid );
4701 } else if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4702 const cata::optional<tripoint> target_ = spell_being_cast.random_valid_target( *p, p->pos() );
4703 if( !target_ ) {
4704 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4705 _( "Your spell can't find a suitable target." ) );
4706 return;
4707 }
4708 target = *target_;
4709 }
4710
4711 // no turning back now. it's all said and done.
4712 bool success = no_fail || rng_float( 0.0f, 1.0f ) >= spell_being_cast.spell_fail( *p );
4713 int exp_gained = spell_being_cast.casting_exp( *p );
4714 if( !success ) {
4715 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4716 _( "You lose your concentration!" ) );
4717 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() && level_override == -1 ) {
4718 // still get some experience for trying
4719 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained / 5 );
4720 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained / 5,
4721 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4722 }
4723 return;
4724 }
4725
4726 if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( spell_flag::VERBAL ) ) {
4727 sounds::sound( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() / 2, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "cast a spell" ),
4728 false );
4729 }
4730
4731 p->add_msg_if_player( spell_being_cast.message(), spell_being_cast.name() );
4732
4733 spell_being_cast.cast_all_effects( *p, target );
4734
4735 if( !no_mana ) {
4736 // pay the cost
4737 int cost = spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *p );
4738 switch( spell_being_cast.energy_source() ) {
4739 case mana_energy:
4740 p->magic->mod_mana( *p, -cost );
4741 break;
4742 case stamina_energy:
4743 p->mod_stamina( -cost );
4744 break;
4745 case bionic_energy:
4746 p->mod_power_level( -units::from_kilojoule( cost ) );
4747 break;
4748 case hp_energy:
4749 blood_magic( p, cost );
4750 break;
4751 case fatigue_energy:
4752 p->mod_fatigue( cost );
4753 break;
4754 case none_energy:
4755 default:
4756 break;
4757 }
4758 }
4759 if( level_override == -1 ) {
4760 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() ) {
4761 // reap the reward
4762 int old_level = spell_being_cast.get_level();
4763 if( old_level == 0 ) {
4764 spell_being_cast.gain_level();
4765 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
4766 _( "Something about how this spell works just clicked! You gained a level!" ) );
4767 } else {
4768 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained );
4769 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained,
4770 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4771 }
4772 if( spell_being_cast.get_level() != old_level ) {
4773 g->events().send<event_type::player_levels_spell>( spell_being_cast.id(),
4774 spell_being_cast.get_level() );
4775 }
4776 }
4777 }
4778}
4779
4780void activity_handlers::study_spell_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4781{
4782 if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( *p ) ) {
4783 act->values[2] = -1;
4784 act->moves_left = 0;
4785 return;
4786 }
4787 if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "study" ) {
4788 spell &studying = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( act->name ) );
4789 if( act->get_str_value( 0 ) == "gain_level" ) {
4790 if( studying.get_level() < act->get_value( 1 ) ) {
4791 act->moves_left = 1000000;
4792 } else {
4793 act->moves_left = 0;
4794 }
4795 }
4796 const int xp = roll_remainder( studying.exp_modifier( *p ) / to_turns<float>( 6_seconds ) );
4797 act->values[0] += xp;
4798 studying.gain_exp( xp );
4799 }
4800}
4801
4802void activity_handlers::study_spell_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4803{
4804 act->set_to_null();
4805 const int total_exp_gained = act->get_value( 0 );
4806
4807 if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "study" ) {
4808 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gained %i experience from your study session." ),
4809 total_exp_gained );
4810 const spell &sp = p->magic->get_spell( spell_id( act->name ) );
4811 p->practice( sp.skill(), total_exp_gained, sp.get_difficulty() );
4812 } else if( act->get_str_value( 1 ) == "learn" && act->values[2] == 0 ) {
4813 p->magic->learn_spell( act->name, *p );
4814 }
4815 if( act->values[2] == -1 ) {
4816 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It's too dark to read." ) );
4817 }
4818}
4819
4820//This is just used for robofac_intercom_mission_2
4821void activity_handlers::mind_splicer_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4822{
4823 act->set_to_null();
4824
4825 if( act->targets.size() != 1 || !act->targets[0] ) {
4826 debugmsg( "Incompatible arguments to: activity_handlers::mind_splicer_finish" );
4827 return;
4828 }
4829 item &data_card = *act->targets[0];
4830 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "you finally find the memory banks." ) );
4831 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The kit makes a copy of the data inside the bionic." ) );
4832 data_card.contents.clear_items();
4833 data_card.put_in( item( itype_mind_scan_robofac ) );
4834}
